With the loan, María plans to pay off a house that she is buying with her sister.  They still owe half the money.  The loan will help them to have improved health, to live more happily and for their children to live more comfortably.  They need to have a decent house where they can feel more confident with whatever else may happen. 
María plans to expand her business, to have a larger clientele, to help her daughter have a career one day and to meet all her daughter's needs.

loans.use: to pay off a house that she and her sister are buying, on which they still owe half the money.

loans.name: Carlos Roberto

texts.es:
Carlos de 38 años de edad, tiene una familia la cual esta conformada por su esposa y sus tres hijos de 3, 12 y 15 años de edad,  los cuales dos de ellos  están estudiando,  su esposa esta junto con él pero los ingresos depende solo del señor Carlos, por que su esposa no trabaja.

 Carlos, tiene 10 años de trabajar como vendedor de tambos de gas, el cual hace un solo turno se levanta muy temprano a las 5 de la mañana para ir a hacer las primeras entregas a clientes que tienen pequeños negocios, como ventas de tortillas o comida y termina su turno hasta las seis de la tarde.

Carlos, quiere el préstamo para comprarle a sus hijos los útiles escolares, ya que en esa zona el gobierno no ha mandado los paquetes escolares y también poder ponerle una venta de tortillas a su esposa para  tener un poco mas de ingresos, para así darles a sus hijos un futuro mejor y que puedan prepararse y ser personas con mejor nivel académico.

El sueño de Carlos, es poder llegar a tener su propio negocio de venta de tambos de gas para así mejorar su nivel de vida y el de su esposa y sus hijos que son lo mas importe que él tiene en la vida y él sabe que eso solo lo puede lograr con la ayuda de los créditos.
texts.en:
Carlos, 38, has a family which is comprised of his wife and three children aged 3, 12, and 15 years of age. Two of them are enrolled in school. He and his wife are together but their income depends on Carlos because his wife does not have a job.

Carlos has been working as a salesman selling tanks of gas for 10 years. He must begin his deliveries very early, at 5 in the morning. He delivers to customers who have small businesses such as tortilla shops or food preparation and sales. He ends his deliveries at 6 in the evening.

Carlos would like a loan to buy his children school supplies. In his area, the government does not supply any school supplies to students. His wife will also use the loan to start selling tortillas to have a little more income, therefore, giving their children a better future. The children can can be prepared and be people with a higher level of education.

Carlos' dream is to be able to have his own business selling tanks of gas to improve their standard of living and that of his wife and children. They are the most important people he has in his life. He knows he can only achieve his goals with the help of loans.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies for his children and help his wife start her own business selling tortillas.

loans.name: Mahamai Group

texts.en:
Sangini, aged about 38 years, is the group leader of 17 members of the group Malpara of Bolangir town, situated in Bolangir district of Odisha state in India. Her family is comprised of four members, herself, her husband and one daughter aged 14 and one son aged 17. The member sitting second from left with raised hand, in the first row is Sangini. 

She is a very active lady who wants some extra income from her own efforts. She has been running a fancy cum cosmetic shop at Malpara with the support of her husband for the last 10 years.

Sangini, along with the other 16 members from her village, formed a group and it is the first time they will take a loan from Mahashakti Foundation for development of their existing businesses.  At present her family income is about Rs. 9,000 per month which is not sufficient to maintain her family. To improve her living conditions and to earn some extra income, she wants to access a loan.  From the loan she will purchase face creams, beauty creams, powder, toothbrushes, toothpaste, shampoo, detergent, soaps, bangles, etc, as fancy items, cosmetic items and gift items. She has a dream: to purchase a vehicle to go to the nearby weekly village market to sell her fancy and cosmetic items.

The other 16 members of the group are Sukha, Rupa,  Girija, Chentula, Ranjita, Sultan, Rajia, Sukanti, Snehalata, Guljarbebi,  Jyotsna, Shantoshini, Laxmi,  Nandini, Tilottama and Sumitra. They make homemade snacks,  raise goats, have a betel shop, a fancy shop, a hotel, vegetable vending, tailoring and garage and a chocolate shop as individual businesses.

loans.use: to purchase face creams, beauty creams,  powder, toothbrushes, toothpaste, shampoo, detergent, soaps, bangles, etc

loans.name: Rano

texts.en: Rano was born in 1980. She is married and has four non-adult children. Her husband is a guide. Rano lives in a rural area. She has been busy growing tomatoes and onions on her own land for over a year. She enjoys her job and has been developing her business little by little. In this way, she can cover her daily costs. She is going to repair her old house, but she does not have money to buy building materials, such as cement, wood, and paint. She is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni to buy these items. She awaits your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy cement, wood, and paints for repairing her house.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is 27 years old and married with two sons. The members of family are refugees and have lived in an IDP settlement for a long time. She is a farmer and raises seasonal vegetables. Then she sells them at the local bazaar. She has worked in this field for six years and her monthly income is 200 AZN. 

There is a high demand for fresh fruits and vegetables. People know that fresh food is very useful for health. Beside that they prepare delicious fruit jam for drinking with tea or cook various kinds of national dishes for holidays and parties. 

Rana tries to sell her foods for refuges as cheaply as possible. But she has to think of her income too. She decided to supply other sorts of fruits and vegetables, which do not depend on the season. She applied for a 2000 AZN loan in order to purchase a diverse range of greengrocery items so as to increase her income.

loans.use: to supply other sorts of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 67-year-old married man. He has five children aged between 21 and 37 years. He describes himself to be simple, focused and God-fearing. He operates a retail business where he sells tea leaves. He has been involved in this business for six years. His business is located in a busy commercial street and his primary customers are individuals. 

Charles describes his biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stock of tea leaves. His business goal is to be a wholesaler of tea within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will live a good and a happy life. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM. He will use the anticipated profits to buy more stock and repay the loan.

loans.use: buy more stock of tea leaves

loans.name: Adam

texts.en:
Adam is 23 years old and he lives in Gavar city of the Gegharkunik region. Adam is just married and lives with his wife and brother. His brother works at the bread factory. After returning from the army, Adam became engaged in farming. In his cute farm he has six cows and seven calves. Adam manages to sell a lot of milk, some dairy-products and meat. As a beginner, Adam has to pass through many difficulties that may occur during farming, but he is a patient and clever man who does everything carefully and properly.
Adam asks for a loan of 900,000 Armenian drams in order to buy two cows and a lot of animal fodder, with the hope of making a good profit in the future.

loans.use: to buy two cows and a lot of animal fodder, with the hope of making a good profit in the future.

loans.name: Philemon

texts.en: Philemon is a 27-year-old married man. He has one child. He operates a retail business where he sells onions and garlic. He has been involved in this business for 8 years. His business is located in a market and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge as the high price of products. He will use the KES 100,000 loan to buy more stock of onions and garlic for resale. Previous loans of KES 100,000 were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of onions and garlic.

loans.name: Ángel María

texts.es:
Ángel, solo logro sacar 2 año en la escuela, ya que desde pequeña sus padres la pusieron a trabajar.


Ángel toda su vida desde niña se dedico a cultivar frijol en las faldas de los cerros, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres y desde entonces es la única actividad que a tenido, a ella le toca madrugar a las 4 de la mañana para ir a las faldas del cerro en donde siembra la tierra con la ayuda de su hija,  lo hace todos los días desde las 4:00 am hasta las 3:00 pm para que no le roben el cultivo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para instalar una pequeña tienda en su casa, le sera de gran ayuda ya que tiene problemas reumáticos, lo cual le causa fuerte dolor en la piernas cada vez que sube hasta el cerro a ver y trabajar en sus cultivos y si pudiera tener su tienda ya no se esforzara tanto y no tendría esos fuertes dolores y sabe que lo puede lograr solamente con la ayuda del crédito.

El sueño de Ángel, es llegar a tener su tienda en su casa para ya no trabajar tanto de sol a sol y poder llegar a tener una mejor vida y poder hacerle mejorar a su casa y sacar a su nieto adelante con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Ángel only managed to study up to the second grade because her parents put her to work at a young age. She has been growing beans on the hillside since she was a child. She learned about this work from her parents and it has been her only business activity since then. She has to wake up at 4 a.m. to go up to the hills where she plants her crops with the help of her daughter. She works every day from 4 a.m. to 3 p.m. so that no one steals her crops.

She will use this loan to set up a small store in her house. This will be of great help to her because she has rheumatic problems which cause her great pain in her legs every time she goes up to the hills to check on and maintain her crops. If she could have a store, she would not have to make this effort and she would not have such strong pain. She knows that she can accomplish this only with the help of this loan.

Ángel's dream is to have a store in her house so that she doesn't have to work from sunrise to sunset. She will be able to have a better life, make improvements to her home, and support her grandson with his studies.

loans.use: to set up a small store in her house.

loans.name: José Adrian

texts.es:
José es un joven de 24 años de edad, que estudio hasta bachillerato, es casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su hogar. Él y su esposa viven en la vivienda de su padre,  pues hasta el momento no tiene una casa propia para vivir junto a su esposa, ellos viven junto a 3 hermanos más de él,  su madre y su padre, pero actualmente solo su esposa es la que depende de él pues sus padres y hermanos trabajan.

José presta su servicio de soldado militar en el destacamento militar número 4, él tiene un año de trabajar en esa institución, decidió  dedicarse a esta actividad,  porque era un deseo de pertenecer a esta institución y por qué se le hiso fácil entrar en ella gracias a un amigo que le ayudo. Él antes trabajaba en la alcaldía de su municipio desempeñando el cargo de ordenanza. Para llegar a su lugar de trabajo tiene que tomar un bus por una hora, él trabaja 6 días y le dan libre 4  estos días libres se dedica a la agricultura.

El préstamo lo utilizara para  comprar un terreno donde construirá su vivienda para estar aparte con su esposa de su familia, el préstamo le ayudara a tener su propia propiedad donde a futuro hará su casa.

Para el futuro José desea construir su propia casa digna en el terreno que comprara,  también desea tener hijos con su esposa, desea seguir estudiando junto con su esposa y que  hijos sean personas de bien en la sociedad tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
José is a young man who is 24-years old.  He finished high school.  He his married and his wife is a homemaker.  José and his wife live in his father's house, as they don't have their own home to live together in.  They live with three of José's siblings, his mother and his father.  Right now, his wife is the only one dependent on him as his parents and siblings all work. 

José is doing military service in the military detachment number 4.  He has been working in that institution for one year.  He decided on that work because he had always wanted to belong to that institution and because it was easy for him to get in, thanks to a friend who helped him out.  Previously, José worked in the mayor's office of his municipality as an administrative assistant.  To get from home to work, José takes a bus for an hour.  He works six days on, four days off.  On his days off, he works in agriculture. 

The loan will be used to purchase a piece of land where José can build a house to live with his wife apart from the rest of his family.  The loan will help him to have his own property where, in the future, he will build his house. 

For the future, José hopes to build his own, respectable house on the land he will purchase.  He also hopes to have children with his wife, to keep studying together with his wife, for their children to be good people in their community and to have a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land where he can build a house.

loans.name: Ana Narcisa

texts.es:
Ana de 35 años de edad, es una mujer  trabajadora solamente curso sexto grado ,es una madre soltera  que le ha tocado luchar sola para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos pequeños que dependen totalmente y los dos están estudiando 4º y 6º grado en la escuela de la comunidad.

Ella  se dedica al comercio,  posee un cafetin en el  centro educativo desde hace varios años; decidió realizar esta actividad porque  es el único sustento de su hogar. Anteriormente, se dedicaba a vender casa en casa, pero luego le dieron la oportunidad en el cafetin; su compañero de vida la abandono dejándola sola con sus dos pequeños hijos y quien a su vez tuvo que tomar las riendas del hogar y salir adelante. 

Ana utilizara el préstamo, para comprar mercadería para el cafetin, con el objetivo de disponer de variedad de productos que sus clientes estén satisfecho y tener mejores ingresos para ella y su familia.

 Para el futuro desea ampliar mas su negocio, para lograr mejores ganancias para abastecer las necesidades de sus clientes y de su familia poder darle a sus hijos una mejor educación y que ellos tengan oportunidades  en el futuro que le sean útiles para la vida practica.
texts.en: Ana is 35 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who only went to school as far as the sixth grade.  She is a single mother who has had to struggle on her own to raise her young children, who are entirely dependent on her.  They are both students, and are in the 4th and 6th grades in the community school.  She has operated a small café in the school for several years.  She decided to start this activity because she is the only provider for her family.  She previously worked in door-to-door sales, but was later given the opportunity to have the café.  Her life partner abandoned her, leaving her alone with their two young children, so she had to take charge of the household and get ahead.  Ana will use the loan to buy merchandise for the café, with the goal of offering a variety of products so that her customers are satisfied and she has more income for herself and her family.  In the future she would like to expand her business more, in order to earn more income, and meet the needs of her customers and her family.  She would like to be able to give her children a better education, so that they have opportunities in the future that will be useful to them in practical life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her small café.

loans.name: Aniypakan

texts.ru: Анийпакан 57 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Все дети женаты, проживают отдельно со своими семьями. У Анийпакан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Анийпакан занимается животноводством, стартовав 37 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Супруг работает водителем, имеет ежемесячный доход. Благодаря упорному труду Анийпакан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анийпакан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Анийпакан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт в доме.
texts.en: Aniypakan is 57 years and married. She and her husband have five children. All her children are married and live separately with their own families. Aniypakan has received secondary education. As a main source of income for her family Aniypakan raises livestock, having launched this business 37 years ago by buying livestock for 1,000 KGS. Her husband works as a driver on a monthly salary.  Thanks to Aniypakan's hard work, her farm now includes three dairy cows and 10 sheep. Her monthly income is 12,000 KGS. In order to develop her farm further, Aniypakan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan to increase her livestock headcount by buying calves. Aniypakan plans to use the resulting revenues for an additional increase of livestock. She also plans to save up for house renovations.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandra de 35 años de edad, tiene una familia la cual esta conformada por su único hijo y su esposo, su hijo tiene 14 años y esta estudiando 1º ano de bachillerato y su esposo el cual esta postrado en una cama debido a un accidente que le causo daños en la columna vertebral, lo cual lo ha dejado sin poder caminar.


 Sandra tiene diez años de tener una pequeña tienda, ella desde muy pequeña le enseñaron a trabajar sus padres y solo logro estudiar séptimo año de educación básica, desde que sus esposo tubo el accidente a ella le a tocado mantener a su familia humildemente; tiene una tienda la cual vende algunos productos de la canasta básica de la cual la ganancia le sirve para  alimentar a su hijo y su esposo. 


 Sandra quiere seguir con el negocio de la tienda, pero la quiere surtir mas para  tener un poco mas de ingresos y no dejar de mandar a su hijo a estudiar, lo cual sabe que sera posible solo con su crédito,  ella sabe que no puede salir de casa por que su esposo esta muy enfermo, pero si surte la tienda podrá tener mayores ganancias para pagar el crédito y mandar a su hijo a estudiar.


El sueño de Sandra es poder ampliar su negocio y tener mas productos para vender, así como también que su hijo pueda ser un profesional, ya que ella no lo pudo lograr. Ella tiene ese sueño en la vida que lo puede lograr con ayuda del crédito y confiá en Dios que lo podrá lograr.
texts.en:
Sandra, 35, has a family which consists of her only son and her husband. Her son is 14 and attends school. He is in his first year of high school. Her husband is bedridden due to an accident that caused damage to his spine, leaving him unable to walk.

Sandra has had her own small general store for 10 years. At a very young age, she learned to work from her parents. She only managed to reach her seventh years of basic education. Since her husband's accident, her family has relied on her to support the family which she has done humbly. She has her shop in which she sells basic food products and she uses her profits to feed her son and her husband. 

Sandra wants to continue with the business in her shop but she would like to stock more products, have a little more income, and avoid taking her son out of school. She believes this goal can only be reached with her loan. She knows she cannot work outside the home because of her very ill husband but her stocked store can have higher profits which will allow her to repay her loan and send her child to school.

Sandra's dream is to expand her business and have more products to sell. She wants her child to be a professional, a goal she could not achieve. She has the dream that this life and be achieved with her loan and her trust in God.

loans.use: to stock her store with products.

loans.name: Arquimides Ernesto

texts.es:
Arquimides de 27 años de edad,  es hombre de familia trabajador ,sus padres no contaron con oportunidades ni recursos para que él pudiese aprender aunque sea a leer y a escribir ,pero a pesar de las adversidades de la vida él es una persona emprendedora ,con valores morales ,él no saber leer no ha sido motivo para que él no tenga éxito en la vida. Su esposa  lo apoya y le ayuda en todo trabajan juntos, para darles a sus 2 hijos una educación mejor los dos van ala escuela.

Él  se dedica al destazo de reces y cerdos,  también tienen una  tienda de pequeño ayudaba en lo necesario veía como su padre destazaba y su madre comercializaba la carne y todo lo que se obtiene de la res, es así como él aprendió este negocio; pero decidió  dedicarse por completo cuando se convirtió en padre de familia y jefe de hogar ,esta labor la realiza en su casa de habitación ,destazan dos veces por semana y la tienda es un negocio que se abre todos los días de  6am  a 7pm.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar mercadería para su tienda a si podrá ofrecerle  mayor variedad de productos y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y tendrá mayores y mejores ingresos para su familia.

Arquímides planea a futuro  ampliar su tienda, que los clientes estén satisfechos de encontrar todo lo necesario sin ir de un lado a otro ,brindarle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar para que ellos logren un futuro mejor y seguir ayudándole a su madre  una señora de edad avanzada. Por medio del préstamo lograra tener todo lo que necesita, para surtir su negocio y de las ganancias obtenidas cubrirá las cosas básicas en su hogar.
texts.en:
Arquímides is 27 years old. He is a hardworking family man. His parents didn’t have the opportunities or resources for him to study, not even to read or write. But in spite of the adversities of life, he is an enterprising person with moral values. The fact that he can’t read hasn’t been an excuse for him not to be successful in life. His wife supports and helps him in everything and they work together in order to give their 2 children a better education. Both children go to school.

He works as a beef and pork butcher and they also have a small store. From the time he was young, he saw how his father worked as a butcher and his mother sold the meat and all the other things that are derived from cows. That is how he learned this business, but he decided to do this work full time when he became a father and the head of a household. He does this work from his house. They butcher two times per week and the store is a business that opens every day from 6:00am until 7:00pm. 

The loan that he is requesting is to buy merchandise for his store so that he can offer a better variety of products and satisfy his customer’s needs. He will also have improved income for his family.

Aquímides plans, in the future, are to expand his store so that his customers will be sure to find everything they need, without the necessity of going from one store to another. He will provide his children with the opportunity to study so that they can have a better future and continue helping their mother when she is elderly. Through the loan he will be able to have everything that he needs to stock his business and the income from that will cover the basic things for his household.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store so that he can offer a better variety of products and satisfy the needs of his customers.

loans.name: Farzona

texts.en: Farzona is a 24-year-old young woman. She is divorced and has a little child who is four years old. Farzona lives poorly, with her child. She has been busy sewing national women's dresses for more than two years. She provides services to her clients in her house. She tries to create high quality goods to attract more clients. She uses her income from her business to provide her child and herself with all necessary things. She is asking for a loan of 4,000 Somoni to buy furniture for her household. She awaits your support and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: To buy furniture for her household.

loans.name: Zulhumor

texts.en:
Zulhumor was born in 1967. She is a widow and has a daughter. She lives in a village which is located in the north part of Tajikistan. She is a teacher. 
Zulhumor has worked in a local school for more than 10 years. She is a very hardworking and smart teacher. Ten years ago her husband died and she became the only provider for her family after the death of her husband. 
Zulhumor always tries to develop her knowledge. She studies at the university, getting her second higher degree. She has no money to pay for her education because she has a small salary. She is asking for a loan of 5000 TJS (Somoni) to pay for her education. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for education

loans.name: Jenmy Elizabeth

texts.es:
Jenmy de 23 años de edad,  proviene de una familia trabajadora de escasos recursos económicos, pero eso no fue obstáculo para sus padres a pesar de la situación económica,  logro asistir a clases en un centro educativo curso hasta un bachillerato ,su compañero de vida la apoya en todos los trabajos que juntos realizan por el momento solo tiene un hijo quien esta muy pequeño.

 Jenmy  se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales de granja, en compañía de su compañero de vida ,sus padres le ensenaron a cultivar las tierras y a cuidar el ganado, decidió realizar este trabajo junto a su compañero de vida para lograr satisfacer las necesidades del hogar y de su hijo todos los días lleva sus animales se alimentan  que le queda a un kilómetro de distancia para que estos puedan alimentarse del pasto  y estén gordos a la hora de ser comercializados  y también le prepara los alimentos a su compañero de vida cuando va a trabajar en la agricultura en ocasiones también le apoya directamente en el trabajo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 2 chivos y el resto para comprar fertilizantes, abono mejorando sus cosechas para comercializar sus productos de alta calidad a buenos precios y tenga mejores ingresos en la cosecha.

Ella  planea para el futuro tener mayores ganancias, para arreglar su vivienda y darle a su hijo lo necesario ,el préstamo le ayudara a  comprar abono en una cantidad grande de forma que pueda cultivar mas productos agrícolas. Lo lograra con la fe en Dios ante nada y obteniendo a tiempo su crédito.
texts.en:
23 year old Jemmy comes from a hardworking family with scarce economic resources. But, this wasn't an obstacle for her parents: in spite of their economic situation, she was able to take classes in the education center until she received her baccalaureate. Her partner supports her in the work that they do together. For the moment, she only has one son, who is very little.
Jemmy works in agriculture and raising farm animals and she does this with her partner. Her parents taught them to cultivate the fields and raise livestock. She decided to do this work along with her partner in order to meet the needs of the household and of her son. Every day she takes her animals to graze a kilometer away so that they can get grass and become fat so they can be sold. She also prepares food for her partner when he goes to work on farms on occasion and he also helps her directly with her work.
The loan that she is requesting will be used to buy 2 kids and the rest will be used to buy fertilizers to improve her harvests so she can get a good price by selling high quality produce and will have better profits from the harvest.
For the future, she plans to have better profits so she can fix-up her house and give her son what he needs. The loan will help her to buy fertilizer in large quantity so that she can grow more produce. She has faith in God that she will get the credit in time.

loans.use: to buy two goat kids and the rest to buy fertilizers to improve her harvests so she can sell her higher quality produce at good prices.

loans.name: Rashida

texts.en: Rashida is a 57-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for the last seven years. She offers various goods for daily use. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. Her husband earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is a mother of three children. As she wants to grow her business, she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy more stock of rice, oil and flour from the market at lower rates. Then, she would be able to consistently meet the increasing demand. She is in her sixth loan cycle and has shown excellent repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize part of her revenue to deal with personal expenses and increase business capital.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice, oil and flour.

loans.name: Delvin Elías

texts.es:
Delvin de 29 años de edad,  tiene dos hijos pequeños, de los cuales ninguno estudia por la edad; su esposa se dedica solo a los oficios domésticos de la casa y a la crianza de aves de traspatio, de los cuales tiene sus ingresos y ayuda a su esposo en los gastos de la alimentación. En la casa solo viven 4 personas,  la pareja y sus dos hijos no existe nadie más que dependa de él.


El  negocio de Delvin es,  la venta de pescado fresco, porque se dedica a la pesca en laguna muy cerca de donde vive, y es de donde obtiene los ingresos para el sustento de su familia, este trabajo lo realiza desde hace unos 10 años,  por ser la única fuente de ingreso más fuerte que se tiene en la zona donde vive y todas las actividades que son necesarias para la pesca las aprendió desde que tenía 10 años de edad, salía en compañía de sus amigos y su padre a pescar a la laguna y ha crecido en la pesca, y es por eso que al momento de hacer su familia decidió dedicarse de lleno a esta actividad. 

Siempre la actividad más fuerte ha sido la pesca, aunque también cultiva granos básicos;  pero solo para el consumo personal. La laguna donde extrae el pescado  está a 2 kilómetros de su casa bastante cerca y de la familia solo su hermano que trabaja junto con él y esta actividades las realiza 4 días a la semana salen a las 5 de la tarde y regresan hasta el siguiente día por la tarde, ya con el pescado. Aunque también en ocasiones sale por la madrugada a pesar de muchas condiciones que a veces le dificultan su trabajo.


El dinero de este préstamo,  será destinado para comprar una red, que le venden a un precio aceptable y también estará mejorando las que ya tiene, aunque también espera  realizar mejoras a su vivienda en la parte del techo para dar mejores condiciones a su familia. 

Uno de los sueños más principales que tiene el cliente es crecer en el negocio de la pesca, tener mejores oportunidades de vender sus productos, en el mercado nacional y también ver  a sus hijos como profesionales en el futuro y una de las metas es ayudarle en todo lo que se pueda para que se desarrollen en las mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Delvin is 29 years old and has two small children who are not yet old enough to go to school.  His wife works in the home, and also raises backyard birds, with which she earns some income to help her husband with the household expenses.  There are only 4 people living in the house: the couple and their two children.  No one else depends on him.  Delvin's business is selling fresh fish, which he catches in a lagoon close to where he lives.  He supports his family with this activity, which he has been doing for 10 years. This is the best source of income in the area where he lives, so he learned how to do all the activities that are necessary for fishing starting when he was 10 years old.  He went out with his friends and his father to fish in the lagoon, and grew up fishing.  This was why when it came time to support his family he decided to devote himself fully to this activity.  Although his main activity has always been fishing, he also grows basic grains, but only for personal consumption.  The lagoon where he catches fish is 2 kilometers from his house, which is quite close.  Only his brother works with him.  He works at this activity 4 days a week, going out at 5 in the afternoon and returning the following afternoon with the fish.  Sometimes he also goes out in the early morning due to certain conditions that make his work difficult.  The money from this loan will be used to buy a net, which is being sold at an acceptable price, and also to improve the ones that he already has.  He would also like to make improvements to the roof of his house to provide better conditions for his family.  One of the main dreams of the client is to grow his fishing business and have better opportunities to sell his products in the national market.  He would also like to see his children become professionals in the future, and one of his goals is to help them as much as he can so that they grow up in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net and to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine is from Gogaran village of the Lori region. She lives with her mother-in-law and brother-in-law and five school-aged children (four sons and a daughter). 

Lusine's husband is a migrant worker and continually supports his family financially. Lusine herself has been involved in agriculture, running a farm for fifteen years. Her mother-in-law helps her with farming activities and they both work hard to sustain an appropriate life for the children.

Lusine applied for this loan to be able to purchase fertilizer for cultivation of the land and also pay for the harvest gathering process. It is very important for Lusine to gather harvest and sell it, so the loan will be a huge support for her family. She dreams of expanding her farm and running it in a sustainable way, so her husband will be able to come back to his family.

loans.use: to pay for the harvest gathering process and fertilizer for land cultivation.

loans.name: José Ovidio

texts.es:
José de 65 años de edad, debido a los bajos recursos de su familia y que era bastante numerosa no pudieron darle que cursara algún grado académico. Esta acompañado y tiene 3 hijos quienes ya no dependen de él,  ya que ya han  formado sus propias familias. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y también le ayuda en la venta de marisco(pescado).

José se a dedicado a la pesca desde que estaba muy pequeño, ya que su padre quien le enseño se dedicaba a esta misma actividad y toda su familia. Esta actividad la realiza casi a diario en diferentes horas dependiendo el horario de mayor marea y pesca, los horarios son de todo el día o la noche, luego su compañera lo vende a comerciantes o personas particulares. También se dedica al cultivo de maíz y a la crianza de ganado de repasto.

El préstamo será utilizado, para comprar una vaca lechera,  ya que con esto tendrá mayores ingresos para su familia.

Su deseo, es terminar de construir su casa y comprar una mejor lancha de pesca para que le pueda generar un mejor ingreso para su familia y comprar mas ganado.
texts.en:
Because his family had little money and was rather large, 65 year old José was not able to study at school. He has a partner and 3 grown-up children who already have their own families. His wife works on the household chores and also helps him sell seafood (fish).
José has been a fisherman since he was very little as his father (who taught him the work) did the same thing, as did all his family. He does this nearly every day at different times depending on the tide times and the fish. He either works all day or all night and, later, his partner sells the fish to middlemen or individuals. He also grows corn and raises cattle.
He will use the loan to buy a milk cow as this will bring the family better income. 
His dream is to finish building his house and to buy a better fishing boat so that he could bring-in more income for his family and buy more livestock.

loans.use: to by a milk cow.

loans.name: Nazani

texts.en:
Nazani is a 25-year-old young lady. She lives in the village of Darpas in the Lori region. She is employed but she also has her second occupation; she is a distributor and sells the cosmetics of a world known firm. From the sale of each product she receives a percent and this is considered her salary. Selling cosmetics is something she likes very much and she even dreams of having her own little shop where she can sell large varieties of cosmetics which properly takes care of a woman's face, skin and hair. As she says she has many regular customers that give her big orders nearly each month. 
Nazani asks for a loan of 200,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a lot of products from the firm, to enlarge her assortment of cosmetics and to be able to cater to more buyers and have more income each month.

loans.use: to enlarge the assortment of cosmetics she offers and cater to more customers

loans.name: Ruzan

texts.en:
Ruzan is 21 years old, and she lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region. She is already a familiar client for both Kiva and Nor Horizon. This will be Ruzan’s second Kiva loan. Ruzan studies at the Yerevan State Pedagogical University and in the future she will be a teacher of geography. She is in her last year of studying, and she has great plans for the future. She has decided that she must stay in her city and educate the children of villages, to make them more informed, trained, and advanced in this continually developing world. Ruzan’s parents are proud of their daughter, being so clever and purposeful.
Now Ruzan is asking for a loan of 220,000 Armenian drams in order to pay her tuition fee for the semester. Ruzan sends warm greetings to her lenders for her last loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee for the semester

loans.name: Asha

texts.en: Asha is a 55-year-old married woman. She has one child. She operates a beauty salon where she offers hair dressing services. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are ladies. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the lack of enough stock of beauty products. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of hair weaves and beauty products for use in the salon. Her business goal is to open another salon within five years. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business

loans.use: buy more stock of hair weaves and beauty products

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is a 36-year-old man. He has two children, aged four years and seven years. He describes himself to be humble and polite. He operates a hardware store where he sells metal bars, iron sheets and other items. He has been involved in this business for 12 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are loyal, frequent customers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a lack of funds. He will use the 50,000 KES loan to buy more stock of metal bars, iron sheets and other items. His business goal is to have more than two shops within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will buy a piece of land and buy a house. This is his second loan with SMEP. His previous loan of 20,000 KES was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to cater for his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy more stock of metal bars, iron sheets and other items.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik lives with her son in Shamlugh village. She is an accountant by profession and is also involved in agriculture. Her son works in Yerevan town so Hasmik has to take care of the farm alone. Over years of hard work, she was able to enlarge her farm and now she owns a pretty profitable farm and it helps her to cover basic costs.

Hasmik keeps livestock and cultivates haricot and potato. She is a hard-working woman who has many goals for future. In applying for this loan, Hasmik asks for financial support to be able to increase her livestock by three more oxen. This will enlarge her farm and she will be very grateful to lenders for support.

loans.use: to pay for three oxen.

loans.name: José Rubén

texts.es:
José de 37 años de edad,  es una persona luchadora de escasos recursos económicos motivo por el cual sus padres no pudieron brindarle una educación académica apropiada quedándose sin saber leer ni escribir; su compañera de vida lo apoya en todo lo posible, ella se dedica al comercio y a los oficios del hogar es una familia emprendedora y feliz con sus dos pequeños hijos.

José  se dedica a la pesca, ya que este oficio lo aprendió de su padre desde muy pequeño él realiza esta actividad para poder sustentar a su familia ya que es un medio por el cual él puede obtener lo necesario para el hogar ,viaja por las noches porque es cuando puede pescar del mejor pez y su esposa lo vende con los vecinos porque es buen pescado  y los precios son  accesibles  de madera que lo termina muy rápido.


El préstamo que esta solicitando,  es para comprar trasmallos, equipar mejor su lancha y poder contar con la oportunidad de contratar personal para que le ayuden  y optar por mayor cantidad de peces mejorando el bienestar de su familia y cubrir las necesidades de su hogar.

Su deseo es  mejora su vivienda y poder ofrecer a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar, para que ellos se preparen académica mente bien y tener un futuro estable.
texts.en:
37 year old José is a hardworking person with scarce economic resources, as a result of which his parents were not able to offer him an education, leaving him unable to read or write. His partner helps him in every way possible, and she works as well as doing the housework. This is an enterprising and happy family with two small children. 
José works as a fisherman and he learned this trade from his father when he was very young. He does this to support his family as it is a means by which he can get what is necessary for the household. He goes out to fish at night as this is when he can catch the best fish and his wife sells them to their neighbors as they are good fish and the price is good.
He is requesting a loan to buy a type of fishing net, to better equip his launch, and to be able to hire additional hands to help him so that he can catch more fish, improve his family's wellbeing, and cover the household expenses. 
His dream is to improve his home and to be able to offer his children the opportunity to study so that they are well-prepared academically and have a stable future.

loans.use: to buy a type of fishing net, better equip his boat, and to be able to hire additional hands to help him.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is aged 38 and the responsible mother of two children. She is living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is doing jobs in a small firm. He has some cattle at home and produces milk which Rukhsana sells locally. He has been keeping his herd at home, and through breeding he has been increasing his cattle for many years. Rukhsana wants to increase milk production and wants to buy an additional cow so that she can grow the herd. However, due to lack of capital she is unable to buy a cow.

Therefore, Rukhsana has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can buy an additional cow. She hopes that now she can easily carry on her business towards progress. She thanks Kiva and the field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a cow for producing milk to sell.

loans.name: Marta Liliam

texts.es:
Marta  de 54 años de edad, en tiempos pasados en que las familias se dedicaban solamente al trabajo no era importante saber leer ni escribir tal es el caso de ella, quien debido a su situación económica no asistió a un  centro educativo,  el no saber leer no ha sido obstáculo para sacar adelante a sus cuatro hijos ofreciéndoles lo necesario dentro de su posibilidad económica, una madre soltera que a vencido cualquier dificultad para  brindarle lo necesario a sus hijos no ha sido fácil para ellos por la falta de apoyo de un compañero, ya que hace varios años la abandono con sus hijos pequeños y sin ninguna ayuda pero a pesar de los obstáculos logro que sus hijos crecieran y fuesen personas trabajadoras todos tienen ya su propia familia solo le quedo el hijo menor, quien le apoya en los trabajos y para el sustento de la familia. 


Marta desde pequeña le ayudaba a su mamá en el oficio del hogar, su padre iba a pescar por las noches , en las mañanas ella vendía  el pescado que su papá traía y así sucesivamente, ella se fue involucrando  en el comercio de la pesca para que esta actividad le fuese de gran ayuda en el futuro cuando  formara su propia familia. Se dedica a esto con sus cuatro hijos,  realizan la pesca por las noches para comercializar el producto fresco por las mañanas.


 El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una lancha y trasmallos para su hijo menor, al obtener la lancha podrán tener mayor pesca y comercializar mas producto.

Ella planea para el futuro poseer su lancha en condiciones apropiadas, bien equipada para tener mas ganancias y solventar sus necesidades básicas confiando en Dios, ellos saben que lo lograran  al obtener el crédito ya que este le servirá para mejorar su situación económica y también ayudar a su hijo menor en todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Marta is 54 years old. In times past, as long as families worked, it wasn’t important to know how to read or write, and such is her case. Due to her economic situation, she didn’t go to school. Not knowing how to read hasn’t been an obstacle for her in providing for her four children; she has given them all the necessities, within her economic possibilities. She is a single mother who has overcome all sorts of difficulties in order to provide the necessities to her children. It hasn’t been easy for them, due to the lack of support from her partner. He abandoned her several years ago, along with their small children, and left them with no help. In spite of these difficulties, she raised her children to be hardworking people. They all have their own families, and she just has the youngest son with her. He helps her with her work and in providing for the family.

Since the time she was young, Marta helped her mother with the house work. Her father went out to fish at night. In the morning she sold the fish that her father caught. That is how she became involved in selling fish, so that this business would be of great help to her in the future, when she started her own family. She now does this with her four children. They fish at night and sell the fresh product in the mornings. 

The loan that she is requesting is to buy a small boat and nets for her youngest son. When he gets a boat, they will be able to catch more fish and sell more product.

She plans, for the future, to have a well-equipped boat so that she can have more income and meet her basic necessities. She is sure they will get the loan, since this will help them to improve their economic situation and also help the youngest son with everything he needs.

loans.use: to buy a small boad and nets for her youngest son.

loans.name: Hrachik

texts.en:
Hrachik is 55 years old. Hrachik lives in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. He has graduated from the faculty of Mathematics and Informatics at Yerevan State University. He is very clever and is an already skilled (15 years) teacher. He is now a director of secondary school, where he also teaches mathematics and informatics. 

He says it is very important for him to have interactive lessons, as he always looks for new methods to explain and discuss the theme of his lessons. He is a greatly respected and beloved teacher and director, who is always ready to help and support any pupil in the school. Hrachik is married and has two daughters, who are students. His wife is also a teacher of informatics.

Hrachik asks for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a computer and some new literature of teaching methodology. He says it will be useful for both himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy a computer and some new literature of teaching methodology, as it will be useful for both himself and his family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a type of net to equip his boat.

loans.name: Amazonas De Huayna Potosi Ii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMAZONAS DE HUAYNA PTOSI II” iniciará el octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Virginia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de shampoo, venta de zapatos, venta de accesorios de celulares, trenzado de mantas, venta de soleras, tienda de ferretería.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Virginia es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de trenzado de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años, ya que el mismo es un negocio familiar, posterior a tener su primer hijo decide independizarse.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de corte de mantas) que adquirirá en las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente al elaboración lo comercializará en las tiendas a pedido de la cliente. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros  que le ofrece la institución.

En la imagen no esta presente una señora porque tuvo que ir a consulta médica.
texts.en:
The  “AMAZONAS DE HUAYNA PTOSI II”  Group will begin their eighth loan cycle with Pro Mujer and Centro Focal de German Busch. 

The group is made up of nine members and is governed by a board of directors. Virgina is the President. 

The group has various different businesses such as selling shampoo, shoes, mobile phone accessories, braided rugs and a hardware store.

Virginia is a part of the small businesses that will benefit from this loan. She tells us that she became a member of Pro Mujer four years ago through the invitation of a friend who was already a member of the institution. 

Currently she has a rug braiding business. She started this business several years ago as a family business. She decided to start her own business after having her first child. 

The current loan will be used to increase capital (to buy rug pieces) which she will acquire from fairs around the city of El Alto. After she has made the rugs she will sell them to stores by client request. 

This type of work allows her to gain resources to support her family. She lives with her partner and has four children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she responds that she lives the savings offered by the institution. 

One woman is missing from the the photograph as she had a doctor's appointment.

loans.use: to buy rug pieces.

loans.name: Norberto Wilfredo

texts.es:
Norberto de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, su familia no cuenta con los recursos necesarios y no pudieron seguir dándole una buena preparación académica. Su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios del hogar, han procreado dos pequeños hijos, los cuales están estudiando en la escuela de la comunidad . Estas tres personas son los que dependen exclusivamente de él.

Norberto de pequeño se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva  granos básicos y los vende en elote  trabajo que lo aprendió de su padre quien le enseño las bases para ser un buen agricultor,  todos los días trabaja en sus tierras específicamente por las mañanas, de esa forma puede ver y cuidar sus siembras  para obtener buenas cosechas. Ademas, tiene bueyes con los que trabaja en sus cultivos y haciéndole trabajo a otros agricultores que no tienen para arar o transportar el producto.


El  préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes, abono, contratar personal para que le ayuden en sus cultivos y así tener mayor productividad para comercializar toda la cosecha a buen precio y también comprara una vaca lechera con la que espera tener otros ingresos a futuro.

Norberto planea para el futuro obtener mas productividad, de esa forma obteniendo mejores ganancias con el cual puede darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y  a sus hijos un futuro distinto, lo lograra con la ayuda de Dios y por medio del crédito que es un apoyo financiero en su negocio y en su familia.
texts.en: Norberto is 33 years old.  He only went to school as far as the seventh grade, because his family did not have the necessary financial resources and could not continue providing him with a good academic preparation.  His life partner works in the home, and they have two small children who attend school in the community.  These three people are the ones who are exclusively dependent on him.  Since he was young, Norbert has worked in agriculture.  He grows basic grains and sells them, an activity that he learned from his father, who taught him all the basics of being a good farmer.  He works every day on his land, specifically in the mornings, and in this way he can see and care for his crops to obtain a good harvest.  He also has oxen, which he uses for his crops and also uses to do work for other farmers who do not have them, to plow or to transport their products.  The loan that he is requesting is to buy fertilizer and manure, and to hire workers to help him with his crops so that he will have better production and sell all of his crop at a good price.  He would also like to buy a dairy cow with which he hopes to have more income in the future.  Norberto plans to have better production in the future, and thus to earn more income with which he can provide his family with a better quality of life and his children with a different future.  He will succeed at this with the help of God and through the loan which is a financial support for his business and his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure, to hire workers to help him with his crops, and to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Shabana is the age of 26 and lives with her four children and husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been selling fruits for many years. He sells seasonal fresh fruits in his hometown from his shop. The people like to buy fruit at their door instead of going to the fruit market. Due to the fruit’s freshness, he has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Due to his reputation, the demand for fruit has increased and by noon, his stock comes to an end. His children are growing and so are their needs. To cope with the rapid increase in school fees, books, utility bills and household expenses, he wants to grow his business but he does not have enough savings to buy fruit in bulk.

Shabana feels proud of her husband and appreciates his efforts for his family. She is taking a loan for her husband so that he can buy fruit in larger quantities and an equilibrium scale to weigh them.
 
Shabana wants to save the excess profit for future sudden needs and for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy fresh, seasonal fruits to sell.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
María de 42 años de edad, estudio hasta 2º grado, está acompañada, sus  compañero de vida se dedica a la comercialización de cerdos, el cual los compra en los cantones y los lleva a vender al tiangue municipal, sus hijos estudian y conviven en la misma casa.
Ella es  costurera o modista, además elabora alimentos para niños de un centro de nutriciones que está cerca de su casa. Ella también, cuando su  compañero de vida no puede vender algún cerdo lo destazan en su casa para menudear lo.
El crédito será utilizado por el compañero de vida, para comprar cerdos y tener mejores ganancias para los gastos de su familia y poder cancelar la cuota del crédito.
Los sueños de María, son  preparar académica mente a sus hijos  y poder mandar a construir su propia vivienda claro que  gracias al crédito y sus refuerzos espera lograrlos.
texts.en:
42 year old María studied through second grade. She has a partner who works selling pigs which he buys in rural areas and takes to sell in the municipal livestock market. Her children are in school and live at home.
She is a dressmaker or seamstress. She also makes food for children in a nutrition center that is close to her house. Also, if her husband isn't able to sell a pig she will butcher it at home. 
The loan will be used by her partner to buy pigs so that he will have better income to cover the family expenses and to be able to pay-off the loan.
Marías dreams are to prepare her children academically and to be able to build her own home. She hopes to achieve these through the loan and her efforts.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a 66-year-old married man. He has 12 children with ages ranging from 10 to 35 years. He describes himself to be a visionary. He operates a retail business where he sells rice, bread, drinks, and other items. He has been involved in this business for four years. His business is located in an urban area, and his primary customers are regular customers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be that some products he sells are perishable. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of rice for resale. His business goal is to be the best within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his business. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice for resale

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is from Vahagni village. He lives with his mother, wife and three grown children (two sons and a 17-year-old daughter). Artur is a farmer. He owns a small but beautiful farm, which helps him to gather income and sustain his family's life.

Artur keeps six cows and six calves and is involved in some small cultivation of potatoes. Artur's sons greatly assist their father with the farming activities and, despite their young age, are very good farmers.

Now, because of the hard financial difficulties that he faces, Artur isn't able to purchase forage to feed the livestock. So that's the reason he applied for this loan. Artur has already taken out a loan from a local financial institution, but unfortunately wasn't able to repay it. However, thanks to his hard work during recent years, Artur and his family were able to run their agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that they will be able to cover monthly payments. So, he has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international, which provides a second-chance loan to people who have a bad credit history and no access to credit.

Artur is sure that his Kiva loan will improve his faming business and he hopes for the lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for forage for his livestock

loans.name: Aasia

texts.en: Aasia is a 23-year-old married woman and mother of four children. She has been running a business of milk selling with her husband for four years. They have two buffaloes and sell their milk to many of their neighbors, along with butter and cheese that they make from the milk. She looks after the buffaloes and performs the task of collecting their milk, while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis. They are happily doing it together to support their family. Currently, she is in her sixth loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto de 66 años de edad, es una persona que no pudo estudiar sino que se dedico a trabajar.  Se ha dedicado toda la vida al cultivo del maíz lo cual le ha proporcionado su sustento diario, esto lo logro aprender gracias a sus padres que le enseñaron desde pequeño. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar dos vacas lecheras, para vender la leche a los vecinos que la comprar mucho por esos lados. Así de ese dinero de la venta de la leche, podrá sacar el dinero para mandar a su nieto a la escuela y no tener problemas para sostener a su familia y sabe que solo lo podrá lograr con la ayuda del crédito por que con lo poco que gana solo le alcanza para la alimentación y no puede cubrir otras necesidades.


El sueño de de Roberto, es que su nieto pueda preparase y llegar a ser un profesional ya que no tubo esa oportunidad de llegar a estudiar mucho o por lo menos lo necesario y él sabe que este sueño lo puede lograr pero solo con la ayuda del crédito que se le brindara.
texts.en:
Robert is 66 years old. He was unable to study; rather, he has always worked. He has worked his whole life cultivating corn, which has been his main source of food. He learned how to do this thanks to his parents, who taught him from the time he was very young. 

The loan that he is requesting is to buy two milk cows, so he can sell the milk to his neighbors, who buy a lot of milk. With the money from selling the milk, he will be able to send his grandson to school and he also won’t have problems providing for his family. He knows that he will only be able to achieve this with the help of the loan because the little that he earns is only enough for food and he can’t cover other needs.

Robert’s dream is that his grandson will be able to study and become a professional. He himself didn’t have the opportunity to study much, or at least not enough and he knows that this dream can be achieved only with the help of the loan that he will be given.

loans.use: to buy two milk cows, in order to sell their milk.

loans.name: Calacoto Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CALACOTO” iniciará el octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Julia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ollas, tejido de mantas, venta de queso, producción de puertas, taller de cerrajería, venta de papa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Julia es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ollas; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años, al ayudar a una amiga de la zona quien tenía este negocio, posterior a su muerte ella decide continuar esta actividad.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ollas) que adquirirá en las fábricas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en las de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de la ciudad de El Alto. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella es casada y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y el servicio médico que le ofrece la institución.
texts.en: The "CALACOTO" communal association is starting its eighth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the German Busch focal center.  It is made up of eight members and is led by an executive committee, of which Julia is president.  The businesses operated by the members of the communal association are varied, and include the following: selling pots, weaving blankets, selling cheese, making doors, a locksmith's shop, and selling potatoes.  The loan will benefit small microbusiness owners, including Julia.  She says that she has belonged to Pro Mujer for four years, having joined at the invitation of an advisor from the organization who came to visit her in her home.  She currently has a business selling pots.  She says that she learned this business a few years ago by helping a friend in her neighborhood who was operating this business.  After her friend died she decided to continue with the business.  The loan will be used to increase her capital (by buying pots), which she will acquire from factories in the city of El Alto.  She will then sell them as a mobile vendor in different parts of the city of El Alto.  This type of work allows her to earn income to support her family, as she is married and has six children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the training and the medical services that the organization offers.

loans.use: to buy pots.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en:
Andranik is from Lernantsq village. He lives together with his parents (who are in the photo), grandfather, sister, brother and sister-in-law. The whole family have been involved in agriculture for 20 years. They run a  big farm which includes cows, sheep, calves, oxen, and chickens, as well as an arable land where potato and wheat are cultivated. 
The whole family runs the farm with great love and care and for many years the farming business has been the only source of their income.
So, by applying for this loan, Andranik would like to ask Kiva lenders for support. He needs the loan to be able to purchase potato seeds and forage for the livestock.
He has already taken out a loan from a local financial institution, but unfortunately wasn't able to repay it. However, thanks to his hard work during recent years, Andranik and his family were able to run their agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that they will be able to cover monthly payments. So, he has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International which provides a second-chance loan to people who have a bad credit history and no access to credit.
The whole family waits for your support.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds and forage for the livestock

loans.name: Najran

texts.en:
Najran is a 58-year-old married woman and a dedicated mother of five children. She is efficiently doing business rearing cattle with her husband, who is shown in the picture, and has done this for many years. She purchases small calves and sells them near the Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries like Pakistan). She earns a good profit from this business. 

She is respected in her home due to her hard work. She helps her husband in all family matters, as well as financial matters. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by sending her son to college for further studies.

She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase a buffalo.

loans.name: Shahzadi

texts.en: Shahzadi is a 33-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. The man shown in the photo is the husband of Shahzadi, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to continue functioning. For this reason, Shahzadi has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to repair and to purchase some spare auto parts. This will help her husband drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Shahzadi is hopeful that this loan will be productive for her husband and bring positive changes to his business. It’s her fifth loan cycle and she has a good repayment history.

loans.use: to repair and to purchase some spare auto parts.

loans.name: Cesar Orlando

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 31 años de edad, sus estudios realizados fueron hasta el bachillerato, su esposa tiene 30 años de edad y administra su sala de belleza ubicado en centro de la ciudad de la ciudad, tienen 3 hijos uno de 1 año  otro de 3 años y la mayor de 5 años de edad. Ellos viven en casa propia.


Cesar trabaja en la reparación de celulares en un local de una amiga que vende celulares y accesorios para los mismos, ella le ha brindado un lugar en su negocio para que él brinde el servicio de reparación tiene un año de dedicarse a esta labor la cual  le está generando ingresos. Aprendió este trabajo por medio de un taller que recibió, años anteriores el local donde trabaja esta 20 minutos del lugar donde vive viaja en bus. El horario de atención es de 7:30 am a 5:00 pm de lunes a viernes, sábado 7:30 a12:00 md


El dinero lo utilizara, para comprar equipo para prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, además necesita comprar repuestos para tenerlos a disposición y dar una más rápida solución a los desperfectos que presenten los aparatos telefónicos.

Sus planes a futuro es tener su propio local donde pueda vender celulares y otros accesorios, así como brindar el servicio de reparación. Lo cual le permitiría mejorar más sus ingresos al seno familiar y brindar más empleo a otras personas que como él luchan día a día por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is 31 years old. He studied through high school. His wife is 30 years old and has her own beauty salon in the center of the city. They have three children; one is 1 year old, another is 3 years old, and the oldest is 5 years old. They live in their own house. 

Cesar repairs cellular phones in the store of a friend who sells cell phones and accessories for them. She has provided an area in her business so that he can provide repair services. He has been doing this work, which is generating income, for one year. He learned this work in a workshop that he attended years ago. The place where he works is located 20 minutes from the place where he lives. He takes the bus. His work schedule is from 7:30 am to 5:00 pm Monday through Friday, and Saturday from 7:30 am until 12:00 pm. 

He will use the money to buy equipment so he can provide better service to his clients. He also needs to buy replacement parts in order to have them available so he can provide a quicker solution to the problems that the telephones have.

His plan for the future is to have his own store where he can sell cell phones and other accessories, and also provide repair services. This would allow him to improve his income for his family and provided more employment to other people who, like himself, work hard every day for the wellbeing of their families.

loans.use: to buy equipment so he can provide better service to his clients; he also needs to buy replacement parts in order to have them on hand.

loans.name: Bartolinas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BARTOLINAS” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Quintina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, venta de comida, tienda de barrio, venta de tucumanas, taller de costura, venta de medias, tejido de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Quintina es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido y venta de guantes y gorros; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió en un trabajo anterior, donde realizaba los mismos productos para la exportación, posteriormente decide independizarse y emprender su negocio al mercado nacional.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de máquinas de telares) que adquirirá de los fabricantes de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo instalará en su espacio de trabajo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las el área de capacitación que le ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “BARTOLINAS” communal bank will begin its second cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the focus point of Collpani. It is made up of eight members and is directed by a board, of which Quintina is the President. The business activities that the community bank´s members carry out are varied. Among them are: blanket sales, food sales, a neighborhood store, tucumana (meat-filled pastry) sales, a sewing workshop, sock sales, and blanket weaving.

The loan that they will get out will benefit small micro-entrepreneurs, one of which is Quintina. She states that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years, and that she joined at the invitation of her friend who is a partner of the institution. Currently, she has a weaving business and she sells gloves and hats. She states that she learned this business from a former job where she made the same products for exportation, and later decided to become independent and take her business to the national market.

The loan she will take out now is for an increase in capital so she can buy looms that she will acquire from the manufacturers in the city of La Paz, and afterward, install in her working space. This way of working allows her to generate an income to maintain her household as well as she can, since she is married and has two children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the area of the institution that offers training.

loans.use: to buy looms

loans.name: Paulo

texts.en:
Paulo is a 64-year-old, married man. He has four children, with ages ranging from 16 years to 28 years. He describes himself as being patient and ambitious. 

Paulo operates a retail business where he sells poultry. He has been involved in this business for six years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are regular customers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be poultry disease outbreaks. 

He will use the KES 10,000 loan to buy more stocks of poultry to resell. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that, in the future, he will expand his business. 

This is Paulo's first loan with SMEP Deposit Taking Microfinance Limited (SMEP DTM). He will use the anticipated profits to take care  of his family.

loans.use: buy more stocks of poultry to resell.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is a 55 year old married woman.  She has been involved in the business of selling fruits with her husband (also shown in the photo) for many years. They make a good amount of income to bear their household expenditures.  

She is a loving mother of six children; three daughters & three sons.  She is responsible for their food, health and education.  For the improvement of business she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 60,000 to purchase sacks of apples, mangoes and oranges.  This will help them to meet market demands more consistently.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of apples, mangoes and oranges.

loans.name: Farhat

texts.en: Farhat is a 26-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. One of her children is shown in the photo with her, and the man shown in the photo is her husband. He is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He drives a rickshaw to meet the family expenses, but now the rickshaw needs proper maintenance to keep it functioning. For this reason, Farhat has applied for a loan of Rs 40,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Farhat is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Shah  Sultan

texts.en:
Shah Sultan, age 47, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then her husband sells them out in the market, at higher prices. She makes enough money through her business to contribute to the family's income. 

Shah Sultan needs to improve her business, to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 50,000 to purchase two more calves. 

She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma is a 40-year-old married woman living with her husband and six children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband drives a school van in Lahore city; he provides transportation to the students of the school. Due to continuous driving, most of the parts and tires of the van have worn down and are in urgent need of replacement.

Therefore, Najma has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, the field partner of Kiva, so he can fix his van and can buy new tires. Najma hopes that, through this loan, her husband will be able to buy the spare parts and drive again. 

Najma is part of a poor family. Her husband has is the only earning person and they do not have any other source of income. She seems very happy, thanks to Kiva and their field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to maintain her van and buy new tires.

loans.name: Ghazala

texts.en: Ghazala is a 35-year-old married woman who has been running a crockery selling business for many years. She offers various types of crockery, such as glasses and bowls. Her husband also assists her in selling items to the people of their community and in the local market. She makes a sufficient amount of income to contribute to the family. For the improvement of her business, she contacted the Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase a variety of crockery, such as tea sets, bowls and glasses in various sizes and designs. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. This is her third loan cycle and she has a good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of crockery, such as tea sets, bowls and glasses in various sizes and designs.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 42-year-old married woman.  She is involved in the business of selling bed sheets with the support of her son.  She buys bed sheets and bed covers with different fabrics in various colors and designs from the wholesale market and then sells them to the people in her community.  She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.
