Naseem is requesting a loan of 45,000 PKR from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of bed sheets, spreads and covers to attract more customers and expand her inventory.  Naseem expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of bed sheets, spreads and covers.

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is from Hagvi village.  His family (wife and two children) live in a neighboring country.  Artak was living with them for many years and was a migrant worker.  Now, he has come back to his village where he was born to start an agribusiness.  He currently runs a farm which includes cows and piglets.  Artak works hard to sustain his farm and gather good income and bring his family back to Armenia. 

Artak applied for this loan to purchase a cow and forage for the livestock. This will greatly help him to enlarge his farm and he will be very grateful to Kiva lenders for support.  Artak has already taken a loan from the local financial institution before, but unfortunately, wasn't able to pay it  back on time.  Because of some overdue days that Artak has got, he has difficulties with getting a loan and restarting the agribusiness.  But he has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international which provides a second-chance loan to people who have a bad credit history and no access to credit.  Due to his hard work, Artak was able to run his agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that he will be able to cover monthly payments.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 27 year old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store.   Shahnaz makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan for PKR 50,000 which she will use to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates.  In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand more consistently.  Shahnaz wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Arif

texts.en:
Arif is 30 years old and married with a daughter and a son. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) as are the other members of his family and they have lived in an IDP settlement for a long time. He earns money raising and selling seasonal fruit (quince, persimmon, etc.). He has eight years of experience in this field and his monthly income is 150 AZN.

Azerbaijan people like eating fresh fruits and vegetables, especially fruits, because they are very tasty and useful. They are used for preparing sweets, fruitcakes and pies. 

The place where Arif lives is very cold and rainy. That’s why, from time to time, his harvest dies and does a lot harm to Arif’s business. He applied for 2,000 AZN to build a greenhouse for his trees to keep them safe. This is his third loan and he has a positive client history.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse

loans.name: Salvador Humberto

texts.es:
Salvador tiene 25  años de edad, está casado. Salvador realizo sus estudios hasta el bachillerato general, su esposa trabaja en una empresa atunera desempeñando las funciones en el área de limpieza de pescado. Ellos tienen un hijo 2 dos años de edad,  que lo cuida su madre.

Salvador tiene un año de trabajar en la empresa atunera, su puesto de trabajo es el área de limpieza de agua sucias, su función consiste en coordinar que agua sucia que se genera la limpieza del pescado se conducida a los filtros purificadores correspondientes y que estos estén funcionando correctamente, para que el agua reciba el tratamiento de limpieza y este en las condiciones adecuadas para ser utilizada. Además, de trabajar para esta empresa en sus días libres se dedica a la agricultura para cosechar los granos básicos necesarios para brindarle a su familia la seguridad alimentaria. La empresa se encuentra a 25 minutos del  lugar donde vive Salvador, se traslada a la empresa por medio del transporte del personal que la empresa posee. La jornada de trabajo es por la noche entrando a trabajar a las 6:00 PM.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar todos los materiales necesarios para mejorar su vivienda, con la construcción de una habitación, ya que su casa no posee las divisiones necesarias para tener un poco de privacidad mientras descansa esto le permitirá tener una mejor ubicación de sus cosas personales y las de su esposa.

Salvador y su esposa tienen muy claro lo que sueñan para ellos y su hijo en primer lugar es ofrecerle a su hijo las mejores condiciones de vida, mejorar su vivienda y brindarle los estudios a su hijo hasta que logre alcanzar una carrera universitaria, la cual ellos no pudieron obtener todo esto para garantizarle un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Salvador, 25, is married and he studied through high school. His wife works in a tuna company, performing her functions in the fish cleaning area. They have one two-year-old son, who is taken care of by his mother.

Salvador has been working in the tuna business for one year. His position is in the dirty water cleaning area. His job consists of assuring that the dirty water that is generated by the fish cleaning is routed to the correct purifying filters, and that the filters are working correctly, so that the water receives the cleaning treatment and is in the right condition to be used.

Besides working for this business, on his free days he makes a living in agriculture, sowing the basic grains necessary to offer his family food security. The business is 25 minutes from where Salvador lives. He goes to the business in the transport provided for the business´ personnel. The work shift is nightly, beginning at 6:00 p.m.

The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of all the materials necessary to improve his home by building a room, since his home does not have the divisions necessary to get a little privacy while one rests. This will allow him to have a better location for his and his wife´s personal things.

Salvador and his wife are very clear on what their dream is for themselves and their son. They want to offer their son the best living conditions, improve their home, and offer their son the opportunity to study until he attains a university degree, which they were unable to do. All of this is to guarantee him a better future.

loans.use: to buy all of the materials necessary to improve his home by building a room

loans.name: María Evangelista

texts.es:
María de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta 7ª grado, actualmente se dedica al comercio de ropa, medicina y productos alimenticios para la cocina, esta  casada; su esposo se dedica a trabajar como albañil donde tienen sus ingresos para solventar sus gastos en su hogar, es una familia muy unida. 

María tiene 8 años de dedicarse al comercio de medicina y 2  años a la venta de ropa, donde se trasladas a los municipios en donde. Además,  tiene una pequeño negocio de venta de productos para la cocina donde tiene otro poquito de ganancia, la señora es trabajadora quien con esfuerzo quiere mantener y sacar adelante su negocio, la señora se traslada a la ciudad que está a 10 kilómetros la cual aborda un bus para ir a comprar su mercadería, tanto la ropa como la medicina para luego salir a venderlos a los cantones y caseríos del municipio.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar  4 docenas de froscrol vitaminado, 4 decenas de froscrol forte antiestrés, 4 docenas de negrotopadefemetocena, 1 docena de pantalones para mujer, 1 docena de pantalones para hombre, 1 docena de blusas y 1 docena de camisas entre otras cosas.

Su deseo es mantener y seguir creciendo en el negocio,  ya que sus aspiraciones es ampliar el negocio y mejorar su vivienda para tener el negocio en un mejor ambiente
texts.en:
María, 50, studied up to seventh grade.  She's married and her husband works in construction, where they get the income to pay for the household expenses.  They're a very close family.

Currently María works selling clothing, medicine, and nutritional products for the kitchen.  She has sold medicine for eight years and clothing for two.  She goes to towns to sell her products.  She also has a small business selling kitchen products from which she earns a little profit.

María's a hardworking woman who makes an effort to keep getting ahead with her business.  She takes a bus to the city 10 kilometers away to buy both clothing and medicine.  Later she goes out to sell her merchandise in the hamlets and communities in the municipality.

The loan María's requesting from CrediCampo is to buy 4 dozen units of Foskrol vitamins, 4 dozen units of anti-stress Foskrol, 4 dozen units of Negrotopadefemetocena, 1 dozen pairs of women's pants, 1 dozen pairs of men's pants, 1 dozen blouses, 1 dozen shirts, and other merchandise.

María wants to support and continue growing in her business, expand her business, and improve her home to have a better environment for her business.

loans.use: to buy medicine and clothing

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Ms Azra is a 45-year-old married woman and mother of two. She has been operating a business making boxes for 10 years. With the passage of time, Ms Azra has improved her business and gained a lot of regular customers. Her son also assists her with the business. 

This is Ms Azra's third year with Kashf Foundation and she is happily running her business with their support. She has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy bundles of thick paper at lower rates from the market to enable her to complete orders on time. Ms Azra hopes to have an increase in sales. She desires to use the earned profits for her children’s education and growth.

loans.use: To buy bundles of thick paper to make boxes

loans.name: Safina

texts.en:
Safina is a married woman and the mother of two children. She has had a business of hand-embroidery for many years. She is zealous about her work and client demand is strong. Her embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best-earning resource in her household. 

Safina wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 50,000, to buy raw materials in large quantities to meet the increasing demand, such as thread, sequins, and pearls. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy raw materials in large quantities, such as thread, sequins and pearls.

loans.name: Nasiran

texts.en: Nasiran is a 56-year-old widow. She is a vigorous lady and, for the past five years, has been running a business selling clothes. Her son helps her in buying clothes of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then Nasiran sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Nasiran is requesting a 40,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Nasiran expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: To buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy specialized equipment for his work.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran is 39; she lives with her four children and husband in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been doing physical labor for low wages, and wants to start his own small business to generate income for his family. He wants to start a greengrocery business but he does not have a cart from which to sell vegetables, and does not have the money to buy one. This has prevented him from implementing his plain and earning better money for the family.

Therefore, Sughran has requested a loan for her husband so he can buy a four-wheeled pushcart and start his business.
  
Sughran will save the excess profit, so she can have money in case of sudden needs and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a pushcart and start a vegetable-selling business.

loans.name: Laxmipriya Group

texts.en:
Laxmi is the leader of a group that hails from Muniguda village of Rayagada district of Odisha, India. She is a widow of 50 years of age.  The member sitting first from the right with raised hand is Laxmi. She is managing a vegetable vending shop in her locality.  Laxmi has three daughters aged about 22, 20 and 14 years. 

Along with three other members from her village, Laxmi formed a group and applied for a loan from Mahashakti Foundation for expansion of their existing businesses during 2012. This is the second time the group will take a loan from Mahashakti.

Out of their small income they are maintaining their family in a low profile. At present Laxmi's monthly income is Rs.4, 500 only. Although the income is very low, still Laxmi has a habit of putting aside savings with a vision for the marriage of her daughters in a respectable family. 

After learning the business procedure and other knowledge, Laxmi wants to increase the volume of her business. Now she wants a loan to purchase curley flower, tomatoes, potatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, cucumbers, pumpkins, green nuts, brinjal, drum sticks, etc. For better sales she also goes to weekly markets of nearby villages to sell her vegetables. In future she wants to establish a wholesale grocery shop in her village.  

The other three members of her group are Janhabi, Nilendri, Karuna. They have a fancy shop, dry food business and sweets business in the village respectively.

loans.use: to purchase curley flower, tomatoes, potatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, cucumbers, pumpkins, green nuts, brinjal, drum sticks, etc

loans.name: Samina

texts.en: Ms. Samina is a 34 year old married woman. She runs a games business with the support of her husband. Her husband does manual labor and his income is not enough for their family expenses. They are a ten-person family, including Samina's 5 children who are all young enough to be going to school. She needs to cover their educational expenses with other expenses. For the expansion of her game business she is planning to buy another snooker table, which will help her earn more income. (Snooker is a cue game related to, but different from, pool or billiards). So she contacted the Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 40,000 KS. This will increase her income.

loans.use: to buy another snooker table

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel de 36 años de edad, su oficio es destazador de cerdos y vende carne los días jueves en pueblo, los demás días de la semana él se dedica a la agricultura.  Vive con su familia que esta formada por su esposa,  quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a ayudar al destazo con su esposo y los demás días se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar, ellos son padres de 4 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando en la escuela.


Él tiene una experiencia de 6 años realizando esta actividad del destazo, manifiesta que lo aprendió de sus abuelos  ya que ellos de dedicaban a la misma actividad, desde que eran unos jóvenes y él ha decidido continuar con dicho negocio motivado por los resultados económicos y por la ayuda que le brinda su esposa y sus hijos ya que esto se ha convertido en la principal fuente de ingresos de su hogar. 

Ademas, se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de granos  básicos, maíz y frijoles, de los cuales le sirven para alimentar a su familia y para vender en caso de alguna necesidad.


El dinero otorgado sera invertido, para comprar ganado para el destazo, ya que manifiesta que tiene mucha demanda de este producto y ahora se extenderá, a los días lunes, destazo de ganado y los días jueves, al destazo de cerdos. De esta manera dará un mejor servicio a sus clientes y obtendrá mejores ganancias económicas y podrá dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.


Las proyecciones que él tiene a futuro son: tener un puesto de carnicería en  el pueblo, apoyar el estudio de sus hijos hasta que hayan alcanzado su nivel de estudio profesional y con de adquisición de un nuevo préstamo ampliara su negocio y prestara un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Israel, 36, is a pig butcher by profession and he sells meat in town on Thursdays. On the other weekdays, he makes a living in agriculture. He lives with his family, which is made up of his wife and children. His wife helps her husband with the butchering, and on other days does domestic work in their home. They are the parents of four children, who are studying in school.

He has six years of experience in butchering. He states that he learned it from his grandparents, since they made a living in the same profession since they were young. He decided to continue with said business, motivated by its economic results and the help that it allows him to offer his wife and children, since this has become the principal income source in their home. He also earns a living in agriculture, particularly in the sowing of basic grains such as corn and beans, which serve to feed his family and to be sold if necessary.

The money granted will be invested in the purchase of cattle for butchering, since there is great demand for this product and now he will extend his schedule to include Mondays, which will be for cattle butchering, and Thursdays, which will be for pig butchering. In this way, he will provide his customers with better service and obtain a better income, and he can give his family a better quality of life.

His projections in the future are: to have a butchering stand in town, to support his children´s studies up to the professional level, and with the acquisition of a new loan, to expand his business and offer better service.

loans.use: to buy cattle for butchering

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a grocery store where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a busy and convenient place and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of fruits and ingredients. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that she will have a bright future. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy more stock of fruits and ingredients

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is a 32-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be patient. She operates a restaurant where she cooks food for sale. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a vibrant place and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. 

Nancy will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food for sale. Her business goal is to have a big restaurant within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to educate her children. This is her third loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to start a poultry business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food for sale

loans.name: Gurgen

texts.en:
Gurgen is 53 years old and he lives in the village of Ddmashen in the Gegharkunik region. Gurgen is married and has a nice big family; he has a son and two daughters. His son now works abroad and transfers money to his family members. Gurgen’s elder daughter is a German language specialist, and his younger daughter is a student at the State Economical University. Gurgen’s wife is a biology teacher at the village school. 

Gurgen also has a higher education and a specialty in mechanical engineering. He has a rich farm, which is his family’s main source of income. All of the family is engaged in the care of it. On their farm they have 3 cows, 2 heifers, 3 calves, 6 sheep, 13 piglets, 40 beehives, and 20 chickens. As Gurgen says, in farming, men must act cleverly and carefully, otherwise the problems sometimes create more losses than income.

Gurgen asks for a loan of 250,000 AMD in order to increase the number of his beehives and become more skilled in beekeeping.

loans.use: to increase the number of his beehives and become more skilled in beekeeping.

loans.name: Fakhr Unisa

texts.en:
Fakhr Unisa is a 36-year-old married woman. She is mother of four children. She is motivated to provide all conveniences of life to her family. Eight years ago she started up a store with her husband (also shown in the photo) in their locality. They offer various items such as jewelry, hair accessories, sports goods and various games. At present they have attained a regular list of customers and earn a good amount of income to bear their household expenditures. Fakhr Unisa has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

Currently Fakhr Unisa is in her fourth loan cycle and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000. This will help her to purchase a stock of jewelry items and different hair accessories to meet the increasing demand of their customers. The couple wishes to utilize part of their revenues to deal with personal expenses and part to increase their business capital.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry items and different hair accessories.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en: Ms. Robina is a 39-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has 14 years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing goods from the market, as he has developed many contacts over the years. Robina is a mother of five children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy salt, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand of the customers at her store. She expects a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine is from Margahovit village. She lives with her husband and three children (two school-age daughters and a 6-year-old son). 

Lusine and her husband are farmers with many years of experience running a farm. They keep livestock of sheep, chickens, and cows and also cultivate potatoes and grass. The income from agriculture is hardly enough to cover the family's basic needs; Lusine asks for Kiva lenders' support. 

She applied for this loan to purchase forage for the livestock. This will help her to feed the livestock and continue running the farm. Lusine and her family are waiting for your support and they hope for your goodwill.

loans.use: to purchase forage for the livestock.

loans.name: Safia

texts.en:
Safia is a 40-year-old married woman living with her spouse and four children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

Her husband owns a butcher shop; he earns sufficient income for the whole family. In the beginning, he purchased a little quantity of beef from then market then sold it in his locality. Now, he has gotten a lot of experience and retained a list of good customers in a short time. Now, he wants to buy a bull calf for producing more beef to sell but he does not have enough cash on hand.

Therefore, Safia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so her husband can buy a bull calf for getting beef. She hopes that her husband can generate more income by utilizing the loan amount. She thanks Kiva and its lenders and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To help her husband buy a bull calf for beef production.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto de 60 años de edad,  trabaja como director del centro escolar de la comunidad, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, con quien ha procreado un hijo, el cual se encuentra en los Estados Unidos. El señor Roberto dedica a tiempo completo a su trabajo, ya que vive en la misma comunidad desde 25 años, él egreso de la universidad en el año de 1989 y desde entonces se encuentra trabajando en la escuela de su comunidad, manifiesta que le gusta mucho su trabajo y que disfruta invertir parte de su tiempo con los niños y niñas de esa comunidad.

El centro educativo le queda a unos 900 metros de su casa, por lo cual no se le dificulta viajar al centro escolar.

El dinero sera utilizada para consolidar unas deudas del centro escolar, ya que meses atrás construyeron un salón de usos múltiples de los cuales adquirieron una deuda con una ferretería, y se hacia necesaria y pronta la consolidación de esta deuda. De esta manera los niños y niñas tendrán un mejor espacio de esparcimiento y mejores condiciones en el Centro Escolar. 

Las proyecciones que el señor Roberto tiene a un futuro, son las de tener un Centro Escolar muy equipado y con zonas de recreación y una infraestructura mas moderna y esto se lograra con la adquisición de un nuevo préstamo. Que mejorara el acceso a la educación como uno de los principales derechos de los niños y niñas.
texts.en:
Roberto, 60, works as the director of a school in the community. His wife makes a living as a domestic employee. With her, he has a son who is in the United States. Roberto works full time, and he has lived in the same community for 25 years. He graduated from university in 1989 and since then, has been working in a school in his community. He states that he likes his work very much and enjoys investing part of his time in the community´s girls and boys.

The educational center is 900 meters from his house, which is why it is not difficult to travel to the school. The money will be used to consolidate some of the school´s debt, since months ago they built a multipurpose room, from which they acquired a debt to the hardware store, and it has become necessary to promptly consolidate this debt. Once this is done, the boys and girls will have a better recreational space and better conditions at the school.

Roberto´s projections for the future include having a better-equipped school with recreational areas and more modern infrastructure, which he will be able to achieve with the acquisition of a new loan. He would like to improve access to education as one of the principal rights of boys and girls.

loans.use: to consolidate some debt acquired by the school

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy wedding dresses.

loans.name: Walter Yovany

texts.es:
Walter es una persona de 24 años de edad, que se dedica a la albañileria y a la agricultura, él vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas de las cuales una se encuentra estudiando parvularia en la escuela de la comunidad y la otra aun  no asiste a clases porque todavía no tiene la edad adecuada para someterse a los estudios.

El joven Walter es tiene experiencia de 6 años en trabajos de albañil. Oficio que aprendió de su padre con quien se creció y dedico mucho empeño para aprender y en la actualidad es  su principal fuente de ingreso, ademas se dedica a la elaboración de madera para realizar trabajos de carpintería y en las ocasiones en las que no tiene trabajo en ninguna de las dos áreas antes mencionadas, se dedica a la agricultura de esta manera puede llenar todas la necesidades básicas de su familia.

El dinero sera utilizado, para la compra de una motocierra, herramienta que utilizara para optimizar su trabajo y prestara un mejor servicio a las personas a las cuales presta su servicio, por lo cual tendrá mayor demanda y lo que le dará un mejor resultado en los ingresos económicos y podrá dar lo mejor a su familia. 

Las metas que tiene para un futuro, son las de tener su propio negocio de ferretería ya que en el lugar donde vive hay que salir demasiado temprano para llegar al pueblo y comprar los materiales necesarios para trabajar y también con ayuda de un crédito pondrá una tienda para que sea administrada por su esposa, de esta forma darán lo mejor y necesario a sus dos hijas.
texts.en:
Walter is 24 years old and he works in agriculture and masonry.  He lives with his wife and their two daughters.  One of his daughters is in preschool and the other is not yet in school because she is too young.

Walter has 6 years of experience working in masonry.  He learned this work from his father who he spent a lot of time with throughout childhood and he worked hard to learn how to be a mason. It is his main source of income.  Also, he does woodworking so that he can become a carpenter. On occasion when he doesn't have any work in either of these two fields, he works in agriculture so that he can provide all the basic necessities for his family.

This loan will be used to purchase a motorbike and to buy the tools that he needs to improve his work so that he will be able to provide a better service to his customers. He will also be able to grow his business and will be able to improve his income so that he can provide for his family.

His goals for the future are to have his own hardware business, since he has to get up early to travel all the way to town in order to buy the necessary materials for work. With the help from this loan he will be able to have a store that will be managed by his wife.  This will provide a better situation for his wife and his two daughters.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a married man who has two children. When asked, he describes himself as honest.

For the past five years Francis has operated a restaurant where he is the cook. His business is located in a busy and convenient place, and his customers come from all walks of life. He describes his biggest business challenge as a lack of sufficient money to buy more stocks of ingredients.

This will be Francis’s first loan with SMEP DTM. He is applying for a 20,000 KES loan to buy more ingredients for his dishes. His business goal is to expand his restaurant within five years. He looks forward to a bright future.

loans.use: o buy more ingredients for his dishes.

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel lives in Katnajur village with his wife and two children (27 years-old son and 22-years-old daughter).
Samvel is a migrant seasonal worker and also is a farmer. During months when he is here, he is involved in agriculture. Particularly Samvel keeps cows, pigs, piglets, chickens and turkeys, as well he cultivates wheat and potatoes. He works day and night and feels very responsible to give his family appropriate living conditions. Now, he has applied for this loan to purchase potato seed and forage for feeding the livestock. This will help him to increase his agricultural turnover. 
As this is Samvel's first loan it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn't have access to credit products in the past because they had no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for potato seed and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad was born in 1982. He is married and a father of 5. Mohammad has been trying his best to provide his children with the best education and to cover his children's needs. He started his project of selling birds 6 years ago and found it profitable and a good source of income, so he decided to expand it gradually. Now he needs to expand the number of birds he has to increase his profit. Because he doesn't have enough money to do so on his own, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more birds for his business

loans.name: Pir Baba Group

texts.en:
Khushnamara is a 52-year-old lady who lives in a small town called JK Pur of Rayagada District, Odisha, India. She is the group leader of a four-member group. Her family is comprised of six members, herself, her husband and two sons aged 28 and 21 and two daughters aged 19 and 25. The member standing first from right with raised hand is the featured member. At present she is running a grocery shop in her locality very successfully. Her husband is also helping her in marketing and selling of grocery items. In the morning and evening, her husband helps her. Her husband is doing a seasonal business of seasonal grains. He purchases and sells them in the local market.

Khushnamara is a very active lady who wants some extra income with her own efforts. At present her family income is about Rs.5,500 per month which is not sufficient to maintain her family. 

It is the second time the group will access a loan from Mahashakti. From the loan Khushnamara   will purchase rice, pulses, sugar, tea, salt, oil, nuts, detergent powder, soaps, and other grocery items to expand her business.  

Among the other three members of her group, Israth and Sukanti are doing scrap material businesses (Kabadi Khana business) individually and Sarojini is doing a sarees and cloth business in their locality.

loans.use: to purchase rice, pulses, sugar, tea, salt, oil, nuts, detergent powder, soaps, and other grocery items

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a 31-year-old married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a bakery where he sells cakes, chapatis, mandazi and other items. He has been involved in this business for six years. His business is located in a busy and productive place.  His primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock of ingredients. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of wheat flour, cooking oil and other ingredients for preparing cakes, mandazi, chapati, etc. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that he will have a bright future. This is his second loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of wheat flour, cooking oil and other ingredients

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Thanh is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food, beverages and washing powder to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy more food, beverages and washing powder to restock her store

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is a conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Alaa was born in 1989. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Baqaa with her three daughters and her husband. She has been trying her best to support her family financially, and to help her husband in improving their living conditions, by running her project of selling birds for the past six years. Now as it is winter, and some of her birds cannot bear cold weather, she needs to buy a special heater for birds. She doesn't have enough money to do so, consequently she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy a special heater for birds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Francisco Adalberto

texts.es:
Francisco de 44 años de edad, es una persona que realizo sus estudio hasta el 9° grado, ya que en ese tiempo solo existía hasta ese grado, francisco tiene una familia que esta conformada por su esposa y tres hijos de 5, 8 y 13 años de edad, su esposa solo se dedica a los oficios domésticos, él trabaja en la agricultura y también de jornalero, dos de ellos están estudiando y el mas pequeño se queda con su madre.

Es una persona muy conocida en la comunidad, ya que debido a la responsabilidad que se destaca en los compromisos que asume a demás es muy trabajador y participa en los eventos de la comunidad.     

Él no pose un negocio propio, ya que trabaja ajeno y siembra en una porción de terreno que alquila; sobre la agricultura lo aprendió por medio de su padre, él no pose otras actividades que le pueda generar ingresos económico a su familia.
El lugar de trabajo se encuentra muy cerca de su casa como a una distancia de 2 km y se transporta a pie hasta el lugar de trabajo.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para construir una habitación que quiere ampliar en su casa y mejorar el piso de su casa. El crédito le mejorara la condición de vida, ya que así podrá tener un poco grande su casa ya que la habitación es para un hijo.  

Los sueños del cliente es tener su casa, en un buen estado ya quiere repellar las paredes de su casa para que no se deteriore, ademas arreglar una galera para tener gallina ponedora ya que tendrá en un futuro.
texts.en:
Francisco is 44 years old. He completed his studies until the 9th grade, since in that time schooling only existed until that grade. Francisco has a family that is formed by his wife and three children of 5, 8, and 13 years of age. His wife takes care of the house. He works in agriculture and also as a day laborer. Two of his children are in school and the youngest stays with his mother.

Francisco is very well-known in the community, due to the responsibility that he stands out for in the commitments that he assumes. Furthermore, he is very hard-working and participates in events in the community. 

He does not have his own business, since he works for someone else's and sows a portion of land that he rents. He learned about agriculture from his father. He does not have other activities than can generate income for his family.

The place of work is very close to his house, a distance of about 2 kilometers. He gets there by traveling on foot to his place of work.

The loan that he is requesting is to construct a room that he wants to expand in his house and to improve the house's floor. The loan with improve his life's conditions, since he will be able to have a bit bigger house since the room is for a son.

He dreams of having his house in a good state, since he wants to plaster over the house's walls so that they do not deteriorate. Furthermore, he wishes for a shed to have a laying hen in the future.

loans.use: to build a room that he wants to enlarge in his house and improve the house's floor.

loans.name: Phuc

texts.en: Phuc is 32 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Phuc runs a soft drink and sugarcane juice stall to earn a living. She started her business four years ago, and she intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different soft drinks and new furniture for her stall. She hopes her business runs smoothly and that this will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of different soft drinks and new furniture for her stall.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a 31-year-old married man. He has eight children. He describes himself as focused. He operates a retail business where he sells jikos (cooking stoves). He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located in a good area for business and his primary customers are homeowners. He describes his biggest business challenge as the large amount of capital required. 

Vincent will use the 10,000 KES loan to buy more stock of jikos. His goal is to sell a variety of jikos within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will open a large-scale business. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more stock of jikos

loans.name: Desire

texts.en: Desire wants to thank the Kiva lenders for slowly providing a solution to her inadequate income challenge. The loan granted to her previously increased her sales and therefore her profits. She looks forward to a continued partnership. She is hardworking.

loans.use: To buy items to sell in her retail shop.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is a 38-year-old married woman who describes herself as determined. She has three children. She operates a food stall where she cooks food for sale, a business she has been involved in for six years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are of all types. She will use the loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more ingredients for preparing her food for sale. Her business goal is to excel within five years. She hopes that she will have a bright future. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy more ingredients for preparing food to sell.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.en:
Rafael is 42 years old. This hardworking man lives in Ijevan city in Tavush region. Rafael has a perfect, happy and lovely family. He is a father of four school-aged children: three daughters and a son. Rafael works at the electric network as a fitter man. His wife does not work but she takes care of their children, their house, and she also helps her beloved husband in farming. They have a small farm that needs much care and time. On their farm they breed six cows, a bull, ten calves and chickens. They also have a private piece of land where they cultivate vegetables for their family use and  gather hay for use as fodder for their farm cattle. Rafael says that thanks to farming his family covers nearly all their needs, but he wants to offer a better quality of life to his big family. 

He is requesting a loan of 500,000 AMD in order to buy five piglets and animal fodder. In this way he hopes to increase both his farm cattle and family’s income.

loans.use: to buy five piglets and animal fodder

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more red oil, peppers, meat, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dry meat and cow skin for her bread business.

loans.name: Tulio Edgardo

texts.es:
Tulio de 39 años de edad,  estudio hasta el bachillerato en comercio, esta casado y tiene un hijo que tiene 5 años de edad, su esposa trabaja en la venta de frutas en  las afuera de la escuela, tanto como el señor y la señora tiene una tienda que esta ubicada en el caserío, con la cual abastece la zona donde vive, él sea dedicado desde hace 2 años a la tienda. Esto lo aprendió porque trabajaba en una comercial y decidió instalar su propio negocio; también realiza otras actividades como albañil, fontanería cuando la gente lo busca.

El negocio esta ubicada en la propia casa, pero para comprar las cosas para surtir la tienda, tiene que trasladarse hasta la ciudad que esta a una distancia de 9 km.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 3 quintales de azúcar, bebidas, tres cajas de detergente, dos quintales de frijol etc. Menciona que al  por mayor, no gastaría en el transporte para trasladar los producto que compra y ademas mejoraría su negocio y su economía.

Menciona que su sueño, es ver como a crecido en su tienda y que por medio de los créditos, también piensa construir su casa ya que en estos momentos esta construida de lamida y de palo. También ampliara el negocio a medida que mejore.
texts.en: Tulio is 39 years old  and studied commerce.  He is married and has a five-year-old son.  His wife works selling fruit outside the school, and they both have a store located in their small town that provides supplies for the area where they live.  He learned this trade while working in a store, and then decided to open his own business.  He also works in other activities such as bricklaying and plumbing when he is asked to.  His business is located in his own home, but in order to buy products with which to stock the store he has to travel to the city which is located 9 km away. The loan that he is requesting is to buy 3 quintals of sugar, drinks, three cases of detergent, two quintals of beans, etc.  He says that by buying wholesale, he will spend less on transporting the products that he buys, and will also improve his business and his financial circumstances.  He says that his dream is to see his business grow through loans.  He is also thinking about rebuilding his house, as it is currently made of sheet metal and wooden poles.  He would like to expand his business as it improves.

loans.use: to buy 3 quintals of sugar, drinks, three cases of detergent, two quintals of beans, etc.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret thanks the Kiva lenders for the loan granted to her previously. She was able to expand her business so as to increase her income and so that she can provide for her children adequately.

Margret‘s challenge is still lack of enough stock in her shop, which takes away her customers because sometimes they ask for products she does not have in stock. Then, she loses customers to her immediate competitors. It’s against this background that she previously wanted funding to boost up her business and retain her customers. Margret is slowly overcoming this challenge because she is now able to provide most of the products demanded. She thinks with more loans the challenge will soon be history. She is hard working and ambitious.

loans.use: to stock her retail shop.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en: Philip is a married man with one child. He describes himself as honest. He operates a farm where he keeps sheep for sale. He also operates a retail business where he sells sugar, bread, milk, soap and other items. He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located in a convenient place and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock of goods. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, soap and other items. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that he will have a bright future. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy more stock of sugar, bread, soap and other items

loans.name: Artyom

texts.en:
Artyom is 33 years old and lives in Vanadzor city in the Lori region of Armenia. He is married and has a newborn son. He lives with his parents. His father is retired, his mother is a nurse, and his wife does not work since she is on maternity leave now. Artyom works as a senior technician and is barely able, together with his mother's salary, to cover their big family’s minimum everyday needs. For many years Arytom has wanted to do some repairs on their house, but despite his savings the expenses will be more than his saved money.

Artyom has requested a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams, which together with his saved money will be enough at least to repair their bathroom.

loans.use: to repair his bathroom.

loans.name: Mwangi

texts.en:
Mwangi is a 64-year-old married man. He has five children. He describes himself as self-motivated. Mwangi operates a farm where he grows tea to sell. He has been involved in this business for 20 years. His business is located in a productive area and his primary customers are retail customers. 

Mwangi will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of tea leaves for resale. His business goal is to be successful within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will live a comfortable life without straining. This is his fifth loan with SMEP DTM. He repaid his previous loan of KES 40,000 successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tea leaves for resale

loans.name: Shoghakat

texts.en:
Shoghakat and her husband are farmers with many years of experience. Their son is a 22-year-old migrant worker in a neighboring country who from time to time supports his parents financially.

Shoghakat and her husband keep five cows and five calves. They use the gathered milk for cheese production and sell the cheese at local open markets. They also cultivate a small amount of wheat and potatoes. The family's main income comes from agriculture so it is very important for them to expand it. Shoghakat applied for this loan to purchase three oxen, forage for the livestock and to pay for renovation of the tractor. She will be very grateful to lenders who support her financially. 

Shoghakat and her husband work hard to build a big and profitable farm, so that their son will be able to come back and continue their work.

loans.use: to pay for three oxen, forage for the livestock and renovation of the tractor.

loans.name: Naira

texts.en:
This pretty lady’s name is Naira and she is 31 years old. She lives in the village Ddmashen in Gegharkunik region. Naira’s husband now is in the Russian Federation and he does construction work there and from there tries to support his family. Naira lives with her mother-in-law, who is retired, her elder son, and her twins (a boy and a girl 3 years old). 

Naira has a vocational education and she has passed hairdressing courses, but she managed to work as a hairdresser for only two years and after getting married she became a housewife. She combines the care of her children and their house with farming and agriculture activities. (She cultivates and sells potatoes). She is a very active person and she takes care of her farm very nicely and with pleasure. On her farm she has two cows, five sheep, four piglets, and thirty chickens. She has many regular customers from Sevan city who buy her farm milk, meat, and eggs. 

She says that she would prefer better living conditions for her family, but thanks God she and her husband manage to provide their children with basic living conditions.
 
Naira asks a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams in order to buy potato seedlings and some animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and some animal fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is a 45-year-old man who is the father of six sons and daughters. Nidal is an artistic man who draws with colored sand inside different shapes of bottles. He participates in different bazaars and artistic exhibitions to show and sell his work. He also works in a training center to teach his artwork. Nidal has started selling girls' toys. 

Now Nidal is applying for a loan to increase his work by buying more raw materials. He needs to raise his productivity, but doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for his business.

loans.name: Irodavi

texts.ru: Иродави 42 летная жительница района Кубадиён и начинающая бизнес woman в сфере животноводческой деятельности. Она решилась взять кредит на сумму $1000 и начать новую деятельность. Иродави имеет опыт и навыки в этой сфере бизнеса. У нее есть 2 коровы для семейных нужд. Иродави сама ухаживала, поила и кормила скотов и за столь время она набралась немало опыта. Свои навыки и знания в этой сфере деятельности Иродави решила вложить в выгодный бизнес. На деньги от кредита она приобретет телят. У нее есть коровник и много корма для скотов. Осталось купить телят. Иродави верит, что у нее семьи появиться значительный источник дохода, что способствует появлению новых экономических возможностей.
texts.en: Irodavi is a 42-year-old resident of the Qubadiyon region, and a new businesswoman in the animal husbandry sphere. She has decided to get a loan for $1,000 and start a new occupation. Irodavi has experience and skills in this area of business. She has two cows for her family's needs, and she herself fed, watered and took care of the cattle for such an amount of time that she has a great deal of experience. Irodavi has decided to put her skills and knowledge in this area into a lucrative business. She will get calves with the money from the loan. She has a cow shed and a lot of cattle feed - she just needs to buy the calves. Irodavi believes that this will become a good source of income for her family and that it will open up new economic possibilities.

loans.use: to buy calves to start a new animal husbandry business

loans.name: Obidjon

texts.ru: Обидчон 28-летний житель района Спитамен. Он каждый год на 6 месяцев ездит на заработки в Россию, чтобы прокормить свою семью. Его работа сезонная и по окончанию сезона он приезжает на Родину и остается без источника дохода. Обидчон долго думал и решил начать бизнес откорм-продажа скота. Это прибыльный бизнес со стабильным доходом. Обидчон имеет коровник и уже запасся кормом для скота. Он просит кредит в размере 2500 долларов США, чтобы приобрести трех голов крупнорогатого скота. Он очень надеется на финансовую поддержку. Начав данный бизнес Обидчон обеспечит себя работой и источником дохода.
texts.en: Obidjon is 28 years old and lives in Spitamen.  Every year, he leaves home and travels to Russia for work in order to provide for his family.  Because his job abroad is seasonal, when Obidjon returns home he is left with no income.  Obidjon thought a lot about what to do and decided to start a business of selling cattle.  This is a business that tends to provide a stable income.  Obidjon already has a barn and cattle feed.  He is asking for a loan of 2500 dollars (USD) to purchase three heads of cattle.  He is hoping to receive financial support.  Launching this business, will help Obidjon to provide his family with the much needed source of income.

loans.use: To purchase three heads of cattle

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan is 44 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She has been running a general store to earn a living.

She started her business ten years ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different products such as soft drinks and snack food to resell to her customers and buy a new motorbike for transportation.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of different products such as soft drinks and snack food to stock in her store.

loans.name: Pavel

texts.en:
Pavel is 40 years old and he lives in the Khachardzan village in the Tavush region. He is married and has two children. Pavel’s father, who retired already, also live with them, and he is a veteran of World War II. Pavel is very skilled and good farmer. In his farm he has four cows, four piglets, sixty beehives and fifty chickens. He also has a plot of land on which he cultivates vegetables for his family use. 

Pavel wants to increase the number of his beehives and the quantity of his honey for sale. He asks for a loan of 500,000 Armenian Drams in order to buy several beehives which will help him to increase his beekeeping.

loans.use: to buy several beehives which will help him to increase his beekeeping.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein was born in 1959. He is a retired, married man and a father of nine living in a sector in Jordan called Southern Ghour. Hussein has been working in filtering and filling water gallons at his workshop for four years. His project has been profitable. Now, he needs to do some repairs to his store in order to attract more customers and to add new tools, but he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to do some repairs to his store.

loans.name: Gulzarida

texts.ru: Гулзариде 25 лет, разведена одна воспитывает дочь. У Гулзариды - неоконченное-высшее образование, работает в местной школе учителем русского языка и литературы, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Гулзарида занимается животноводством, стартовав 1 год назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулзариды, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 лошадь, 1 теленок, 6 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулзарида обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулзарида планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на завершение своего обучения в университете.
texts.en: Gulzarida is a 25 years old single mother, who is raising a daughter.  Gulzarida had never finished high school.  She currently works as a teacher of Russian language and of literature at a local school.  Her main source of income is a livestock business which she started 1 year ago with a purchase of cattle for 12,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Gulzarida's hard work, she currently has a cow, a horse, a calf and six sheep.  He monthly income is 9,000 som (KGS).  In order to expand her business, Gulzarida turned to the bank of Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan to purchase additional calves and to expand her herd.  Gulzarida plans to use the profits from her business to buy additional livestock and to save some for her university education.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Fredis Leonel

texts.es:
Fredis de 31 años, es una persona muy trabajadora, honesta, servicial y responsable, es motorista de una mototaxi, el tiene de trabajar desde  la edad de los 19 años, esta acompañado con su esposa y los dos hijos, un varón y una hembra de diferente edades el varón tiene 6 años y la niña tiene 3 años, el varón va a la escuela.

EL joven se a dedicado solo al trabajo de motorista, no a tenido otra oportunidad de trabajo  ya que en un tiempo sus padre dejo a su madre y le toco que trabajar para ayudarle a su madre, luego su madre viajo a los estados unidos para darle una vida mejor y se quedo con sus abuelos con el tiempo el creció y se acompaño y hoy en día trabaja día a día para llevarle el sustento a su familia. 

 El  préstamo que esta solicitando,  para comprar los repuesto de la mototaxi,  así podrá reparar la mototaxi ya que es su medio de trabajo que tiene y con eso mantiene a su familia.

 Menciona que mejorara porque al arreglar la mototaxi, podrá compensar los días de  atrasado que no a podido trabajar, en este momento trabaja con una mototaxi prestada de un amigo así tendrá un mayor ingreso de dinero para  pagar muchas cosas como la luz y comprarle zapatos, ropa a su esposa e hijos.
texts.en: Fredis is 31 years old and is a very hard-working, honest, helpful and responsible person.  He is a motorcycle taxi driver, and has worked since the age of 19.  He lives with his wife and two children, a boy and a girl of different ages: the boy is 6 years old and the girl is 3 years old.  The boy goes to school.  This young man has worked on his own as a motorcycle driver, and has not had any other opportunities for work.  This is because some time ago his father left his mother, and he had to work to help his mother.  Later his mother went to the United States to provide him with a better life, and he stayed with his grandparents.  He then grew up and married, and now works day by day to provide for his family.  The loan that he is requesting is to buy parts for the motorcycle taxi, so that he can repair it as it is his means of work and the way that he supports his family.  He says that this will make things better for him, because he can then make up for the days on which he has been unable to work.  He is now working with a motorcycle taxi that he borrowed from a friend.  When the repairs are done, he will have more income and be able to pay for many things, such as the electric bill and shoes and clothing for his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy parts for a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Gulandom

texts.ru:
Эту трудолюбивую и усердную женщину в возрасте 45 лет зовут Гуландом. Она разведена, имеет семерых детей. Гуландом вместе с четырьмя сыновьями, которым по 25, 24, 20 и 16 лет, а также вместе с тремя дочерьми, которым по 18, 11 и 4 года живет в районе Восеъ. В настоящее время ее двое старших сыновей находятся на заработках в России, остальные дети кроме младшей дочери учатся. 
Гуландом имеет среднее специальное образование. Она работает бухгалтером в отделе культуры района. Одновременно на протяжении 17 лет Гуландом занимается животноводством. Она выращивает молочные и мясные породы коров. Она научилась этой деятельности у родителей. Ее отец в свою очередь был пастухом, а мать дояркой. Она унаследовала от них эти ремесла. В данный момент Гуландом просит кредит для купли пару голов крупнорогатого скота, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота. Она ожидает поддержки.
texts.en:
Gulandom is a hard working and a diligent woman of 45 years.  She is divorced and has seven children.  Gulandom lives in the town of Vose with her sons, who are 25, 24, 20 and 16 years old, and with her daughters, who are 18, 11 and 4 years old.  Currently, her two oldest sons are working abroad in Russia, while all of her other kids, except for the 4 year old, are in school.  

Gulandom has received specialty education, and she currently works as an accountant at the regional office of culture.  In parallel to her regular job, for 17 years, Gulandom has been running a business of raising livestock.  He business produces milk and meat products.  Gulandom picked up the trade from her parents.  Her father was a shepard and he mother - a milkmaid.  Gulandom has learned a lot from her parents about running this business.  At the moment, Gulandom is asking for a loan to purchase a couple of heads of cattle in order to expand her herd.  She is waiting for your support.

loans.use: To purchase two heads of cattle

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 42 years old and lives in the town of Lira in the Lira region of Uganda. She is married and has one child who is currently in school. For the past three years, Esther has been working hard to manage her produce business where she sells beans, groundnuts, maize, and sorghum. 

To help expand her business, Esther has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more produce and will help Esther to generate greater profits and capital. Ester hopes that in the future, she will be able to increase her stock. 




"

loans.use: to buy more cereals to sell

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa is 29 years old and lives in the town of Nyendo in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

For the past three years Hawa has been working hard to manage her ladies clothing business. To help expand her business she has requested a loan of 2,500,000 UGX from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes for her to sell and will help her generate greater profits and expand her business.

Hawa hopes that the future will bring her yet more in profits.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh is 52 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She has been running a general store to earn a living.

She started her business fifteen years ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different products such as sugar, soft drinks and household items to resell to her customers.

She hopes that her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of different products such as sugar, soft drinks and household items to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Hani

texts.en: Hani is 22 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with his six siblings and his mother. His father is deceased. Hani is currently working at a clothing store and, at the same time, studying for a Bachelor's degree with a major in Finance. He is in his second year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn a better income in order to support his family. However, because of the financial crisis that Hani's family has been facing since his father's death, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Morad

texts.en:
Morad is 32 years old and a married man. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He runs an iron welding workshop to earn a living. He started working six years ago as an employee earning a daily wage with someone who has the same business. Then he worked hard to save money until he was able to open his own welding workshop.  Morad's business has gradually grown, thanks to his great work capacity, discipline, and responsibility. He is able to attract his customers because he is a professional at making different shapes of doors and windows in iron. 

Presently Morad is applying for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy various iron items, which will allow him to expand his business. His investment will be successful because he has a lot of experience. In the future, Morad hopes to expand his business to in order to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy various iron items which will allow him to expand his business.

loans.name: Saraswati Group

texts.en:
Rabanamma is a 33-year-old lady who lives in a small town named Muniguda in the Rayagada District of Odisha, India. She is the group leader of a four-member group. Her family includes five members: her husband, two sons (eight and four years old) and a three-year-old daughter. The member standing first on the right with her hand raised is this featured member. 

At present, she is running a tailoring shop in her locality very successfully. Her husband is also supporting her in his leisure time. Her husband is a mason and earns his livelihood from his expertise. 
 
Rabanamma is a very active lady who wants some extra income from her own efforts. At present, her family income is about Rs 5,500 per month, which is not sufficient to maintain the family. It is the first time the group will take a loan from MSF. With the loan, she will purchase a sewing machine, a piku machine and some thread to add to her business.  The other three members of the group are Jyoti, Sandhya and Shanti, who are doing an auto business, vending vegetables and running a tailoring business, respectively.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine, a piku machine and some thread

loans.name: Prossy

texts.en:
Prossy is thirty years old and lives in Kalisizo in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has three children, two of whom are currently in school.

For the past five years Prossy has been working hard raising and selling chickens. To help expand her enterprise she is applying for a 2,000,000 UGX loan through BRAC Uganda. The money will be used to buy more chickens, feed, and medicine for vaccinating them against disease. Prossy hopes her loan will result in greater profits and strong and healthy chickens.

Prossy’s ambition is to expand her poultry concern.

loans.use: to buy more chickens, feed, and medicine for vaccinating them against disease.

loans.name: Rajabali

texts.ru: Рачабали житель одного из самых гостеприимных районов Таджикистана района Хамадони. На районе благоприятный климат, чистый воздух и неповторимая природа. Рачабали много лет живет в Хамадони. Он женат и имеет шестерых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Старший сын уехал на заработки заграницу. Рачабали занимается земледелием, имеет большой опыт работы на земле. Рачабали любит животных и давно хотел иметь свой скотный двор и много скотов. Не смотря на свой возраст(ему 64 года) он решился начать новую деятельность и воплотить свою мечту в реальность. Рачабали на деньги от кредита приобретет несколько скотов. У него уже есть один теленок, коровник и корм. Для Рачабали кредит станет важной помощью. Поддержите Рачабали.
texts.en:
Rajabali is a resident of one of the most hospitable regions of Tajikistan, the town of Hamadoni.  The area has a mild climate, clean air and nature of unparalleled beauty.  Rajabali has lived in this area for many years.  He is married and has six children.  His wife works as a homemaker.  His eldest son went to work abroad.  Currently, Rajabali raises various crops, an activity where he has a lot of expertise.  Rajabali also loves working with animals, and for a long time, he has been wishing to own a barn with lots of cattle.  

Despite his age, he is 64, he decided to start a new business to make his dream a reality.  Rajabali will use the money from this loan to purchase some cattle.  He already has one calf, a barn and some feed.  The loan will be instrumental in helping Rajabali launch his new business.  Please support Rajabali!

loans.use: To purchase calves in order to launch a livestock business

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen is 43 years old and he lives in Sevan city in Gegharkunik region. Karen is married and he has a son who is a student of Crisis Management Academy at the paid division. For many years Karen did construction work for the Russian Federation; but for the last 16 years Karen has had his own fruit-vegetable stand business. During these years Karen became rather skilled in this field; he managed to have his own small shop, he bought a car and provided his family with good living conditions. In his shop he has a great assortment of local colorful, testy and fresh fruits and vegetables; potato, greens, cabbage, tomato, apple, grape, orange, lemon, banana, mandarin and pomegranate. All these goods he buys both from the villagers and from re-sellers at the city wholesale market. Karen says that his shop is near the central bus station of their city and he never had a lack of customers. 
Karen has a new idea which needs some financial support. He asks a loan of 850.000 Armenian drams in order to buy acoffee making machine which he will place near his shop; this innovation, to his mind, will bring some more income to his family budget.

loans.use: to buy a coffee making machine for his shop

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a 25-year-old married woman with two children. She describes herself to be loyal and God fearing. She operates a retail business where she sells charcoal. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a marketable place and her primary customers are both men and women. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more charcoal to sell. Her business goal is to be a supplier of charcoal within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a better life. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to sell

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVA ESPERANZA” iniciará el décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Lucia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de abarrotes, tejido de chalecos, vendedoras de jugos, taller de confección, venta de aceite, venta de material de construcción, tienda de barrio, venta de pescado.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Lucia es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio al observar que era una fuente de ingresos que le daban posibilidad de cuidar a sus hijos
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, azúcar y aceite por mayor) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar, ya que ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros y las capacitaciones que le ofrecen en la institución.
texts.en:
The Nueva Esperanza community bank is starting their 10th cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana regional center.  The group is made up of eight members and directed by a board, of which Lucia is the president.  The members have a variety of businesses, including a grocery store, knitting vests, selling juices, a sewing shop, selling oil, selling construction materials, a neighborhood store, and selling fish.

The loan they are requesting will benefit small businesses like Lucia's.  She has been a member of Pro Mujer for five years.  She joined at the invitation of a counselor from the institution who visited her at home.  She currently has a neighborhood store, which she started because she saw it was a source of income that also allowed her to care for her children.

She is requesting this loan to increase her capital to purchase rice, sugar, and oil at wholesale.  She will buy the items at the markets in El Alto and later sell them at her store.  This type of work allows her to earn income to maintain her household, since she is married and has five children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the savings and trainings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and oil at wholesale.

loans.name: Zawadi

texts.en: Zawadi is a married woman with five children. She describes herself to be patient. She operates a tailoring business where she makes clothes to sell. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be competition. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy fabric, thread and other materials for making clothes. She will use the anticipated profits to buy an electronic sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and other materials for making clothes

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is 40 years old and lives in the town of Kumi in the Soroti region of Uganda. She is married and has three children who are all currently in school. For the past five years, Margret has been working hard to manage her business selling bed covers, bed sheets, and towels. 

To help expand her business, Margret has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more bed covers, bed sheets, towels and curtains and will help Margret to generate greater profits and improve her business. Margret hopes that in the future, she will be able to add more stock and expand. 




"

loans.use: to buy more bed covers, bed sheets, towels and curtains to sell

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 40 years old and lives in the town of Masaka in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has four children who are all currently in school. For the past 10 years, Betty has been working hard to manage her bar, where she sells beer, soda and water. 

To help expand her business, Betty has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more beer, soda and water and will help Betty to generate greater profits and expand her business. Betty hopes that in the future, she will be able to expand the bar. 




"

loans.use: buy more beer, soda, and water

loans.name: Santos Eugenia

texts.es:
Santos es una mujer de  59 años de edad, que se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar y a la administración de una minitienda que posee en su casa, la señora vive con su esposo, su mamá y una de sus hijas la cual se encuentra trabajando en un Banco del pueblo y su otra hija se encuentra en los Estados Unidos, de quien recibe remesas mensuales que le ayudan al sustento diario de ella y su mamá y otra parte va para ser invertido en la tienda, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de granos básicos.


La experiencia que ella tiene es de 44 años, ya que esto lo aprendió de su mamá quien dedico toda su vida a realizar esta actividad en su hogar y de la misma manera ella continuo ejerciendo la misma actividad en su hogar. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y de esta manera provee de lo necesario a su familia. 


El dinero sera invertido en consolidar una deuda de su hija, dinero que fue invertido en mejoramiento de la vivienda. De esta manera, mejoraron sus condiciones de vida y pueden tener una vivienda digna y sentirse mas protegidas de las adversidades del clima.


Los proyectos a futuro, son los de continuar mejorando si vivienda con ayuda de otro préstamo de esta manera mejorara su calidad de vida, porque podrán habitar en un lugar seguro y libre de todo peligro y espera apoyar el crecimiento académico de su hija ya que en este año pretende continuar con sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Santos, 59, spends her time taking care of her household and managing a mini-store she has in her home.  She lives with her husband, her mother, and one of her daughters, who works in a bank in town.  Her other daughter's in the United States and sends monthly remittances to help support Santos and her mother and to invest in the store.  Santos's husband grows staple grains.

Santos has 44 years of experience because she learned this job from her mother, who spent her life doing this work in her home.  Santos also does this job at home.  Her husband works in agriculture and provides for his family.

Santos is going to invest the money in consolidating her daughter's debt, money she used to improve the house.  She improved her living conditions and has a decent home and feels protected from the weather.

Her project for the future is to continue improving her house with the help of another loan.  This way she'll improve her quality of life, because they'll be able to live in a safe place free from all danger.  She also hopes to support the academic growth of her daughter, who plans to continue with her college education this year.

loans.use: to consolidate her daughter's debt

loans.name: Ana Bautista

texts.es:
Ana de 46 años de edad, es una persona que realizo sus estudio hasta 9°grado, luego creció y se caso formando una familia, el esposo trabajado en el ejercito nacional, luego él cumplió su trabajo y le dieron de baja; luego emigro a los estados unidos  y encontro trabajo hasta el día de hoy se encuentra en el extranjero; sus hijos trabajan y otros estudian, el mayor trabaja de motorista su estado civil es acompañado los restante están estudiando.
La señora es muy conocida en al zona donde vive ya que ella, participa en las actividades de  la comunidad.   

La cliente no posee ningún tipo de negocio, ya que ella se a dedicado a los cuido de los hijos; aunque debes en cuando hornea pan para vender en la comunidad y para el gasto de su casa; esto lo realiza no muy frecuente. 
Esto lo aprendió de su madre el arte del hornear pan.   


Con el dinero comprara cemento, arena para encementar el piso de su casa, ya que tiene la oportunidad que de parte de su esposo la apoye y también sus hijo para salir adelante. Claramente esto le mejorar su condición de vida.  

Sus sueños y metas son de terminar de arreglar la casa, ya que poco a poco lo podrá realizar a medida que este bien de salud y que si la institución credicampo la apoye para  terminar la casa.
texts.en:
Ana of 46 years old is a person who studied till the 9th grade, grew up, got married and formed a family. Her husband served in the army and later was discharged. After that he went to the U.S. and found a job. Until this day he remains outside the country. Some of her children are working and others are still studying.
